lyrics: O Bright, Eternal One Quam Dialecta, 218
Imi muri izwi Rakasika mwenje Nayo mvonga mvonga Ikave rufaro
Nomukutambudzwa , Makamutsurudza Mwoyo yavatendi, Vakakushumirai.
Izwi rakavanda, Tokuona zvino Napatinofamba, Kristu, ari pano.
Togara maari, Iye wokudenga; Ngatimutsvagei, Dakara tamuda.
O, Ishe, mupenyu, Mwoyo yodudzira Runako rwenyu, ‘She, Nokubwinya kwenyu.
Catherine Baird (1896-1984)
Thou Hidden Source of Calm Repose Wells, 318
Imi muri rudekaro Rwakavanzika murudo; Chipotero kuvavengi Ndofadzwa kana muneni. Muzvitadzo, mukunyadzwa, Ndovanzwa nemi, jesu, ‘She.
Zita renyu, ruponiso, Rondifadza pakudenga; Rounza simba, rugare, Norudo rusingapere; Muzita renyu ndowana Kuregererwa, noutsvene.
Jesu muri zvose zvangu Pazororo, mukurwadzawa, Murapi wemwoyo wangu; Mukurwa, ndichazorodzwa Mondifadza mberi kwemhandu, Ndowana korona yangu.
Mukushaya, mondigutsa, Muutera, mopa simba; Ndosunungurwa majoto, Mwenje, mberi kwomuvengi; Ndichadana, mogadzira Upenyu hwangu kudenga
Charles Wesley (1707-88)
Immortal, Invisible
St. Denio, 569
Mwari Muchenjeri, hamuonekwi Makavanzwa kwatiri muchiedza, Makaropafadzwa Dombo rekare, samasimba, M’kundi, tokurumbidza.
Makanyararisa kunge chiedza, Hamuperi, munotonga nesimba; Ndurano yenyu, makomo marefu, Pam’soro pamakore ane rudo.
Munopa upenyu kuna zvose; Muri mupenyu hwezvinhu zvose; Todenhera semashizha emiti; Tofa topera,asi hamusanduke.
Baba wokubwinya, muri chiedza Ngirozi dzokudza, dzovanza zviso; Tokukudzai, tiyamurei kuona Chiedza chitsvene chinokuvanzai.
Walter Chalmers Smith (1824-1908)
To God Be The Glory
To God be the glory, 576
Mwari ngaakudzwe nebasa rake, Norudo wakatipa mwana wake, Wakafira kudzikinura zvivi, Nokuzarura suo reupenyu.
Kudza ;She! Kudza ‘She! Nyika ngaimunzwe; Kudza ;She! Kudza ‘She! Vanhu ngavafare;
Uyai kuna Baba nokuna Jesu, Kudzai nezvakaitirwa isu.
Ruregerero rutsvene rweropa, Kumutendi chivimbiso chaMwari. Mutadzi mukuru akangotenda, Owana ruregerero rwaJesu.
Wakatidzidzisa zvinhu zvikuru Norufaro rwedu muna Jesu, ‘She, Rufaro rwedu ruchave rukuru, Kana toona Jesu mumakore.
Fanny Crosby (1820-1915)
Jehovah Is Our Strength
Majesty, 226; St John , 228; Millenium, 227
Mwari Samasimba, Iye rumbo rwedu; Naye tichakunda Vavengi vakuru. Satani anorwa nhando,
Nokuti Mwari NdiMambo.
Ishe bako redu Achazongodaro; Wakamisa isu Norwake rubato.
Vavengi vanorwa nhando, Nokuti Mwari ndiMambo .
Jehovah Mufudzi, Anoziva zvose; Isu tiri hwai Tichafudzwa naye.
Chivi norufu inhando, Nokuti Mwari ndiMambo.
Mwari baba wedu, Tiri vana vake; Tichazongodaro, Haangatisiye. Masimba ose inhando,
Nokuti Mwari ndiMambo.
attr. Samuel Barnard
O Thou God Of Every Nation
Austria, 408; Regent Square, 423
Mwari wamarudzi ose , Zvino tikomborerei; Mumwoyo tigadzirire, Uye moto wenyu; Ropafadzai Hondo yedu, Tizadzei namasimba.
Tizadzei noMweya M’tsvene, Mauto ashambidzwe;
Nemi satani aparadzwe, Nenyika iponiswe; Ropafadzwai Hondo yedu, Titumei kwamunoda.
Utsvene hwenyu, tipei , Ngatizadzwe nesimba; Hondo yedu ngaitende, Nom’ towo wokukunda; Ropafadzai Hondo yedu, Muve rudziviriro.
Ropafadzai vafundisi, Vatungamiri vose; Ropafadzaiwo vadzoki, Mauto edu ose, Ropafadzai Hondo yedu Matama tiparidze.
William James Pearson (1832-92)
O Lord Of Heaven And Earth
Troyte, 470; Almsgiving, 469, G
Mwari wedenga napasi, Ngakuve norurumbidzo; Toratidza rudo sei: Mupi wazvose.
Runyararo rwemudzimba Namakomborero ose; Tinotenda, tokurumbidzai; Mupi wazvose.
Makapira Mwana wenyu, Kunesu tose vepasi;
Mwana wenyu mumwechete: Makapa zvose.
Munopa Mweya Mutsvene, Mweya worudo nesimba; Nengoni dzakawandisa, Nokwatiriwo.
Mukununurwa muzvivi, Ndiyo nzira youdenga ; Baba varumbidzwe zvino; Mupi wazvose.
Christopher Wordsworth (1807-85)
A Mighty Fortress Is Our Lord
Ein’Feste Burg, 640
Mwari wedu mudziviriri,
Rusvingo rusingakundwe;
Muyamuri mumirove Yedambudzo roupenyu. Sezvo mhandu yedu Satani aripo,
Ane simba guru, Noruvengo rwake, Haana wezera pasi.
Kuvimba neredu simba Kunotiita tikundwe, Dai tisina M’ponisi Watakapiwa naMwari, Wobvunza, ndiani? Ndiye Jesu Kristu; Ishe wesabata, Asingapinduke, Achakunda mukurwa.
Nyangwe kune madhimoni Anoda kutinyengera; Hatitye, Mwari anoda Tikunde neidi rake. Muchinda werima Hatimudederi,
Ane hasha nhando, Hona! achakundwa. Izwi duku romukunda
Izwi rine simba chose, Kwete, haringambomiswa. Mweya, nezvipo ndezvedu Zviri kurutivi rwedu. Upfumi nehama,
Upenyu hwopera, Vangatiuraye; Chokwadi chomira,
Umambo hwake narinhi.
Martin Luther (1483-1545)
trs Frederick Henry Hedge (1805-90)
Praise My Soul The King of Heaven
Blessed Jesus, 240; Praise My Soul The King of Heaven, 422
Mweya wangu, rumbidza ‘She Pasi petsoka dzake; Wanunurwa, waponiswa, Chiimba mbiri yake; Murumbidze! Murumbidze! Kudza ‘She asingafe.
Mukudze nengoni dzake Kune vari munhamo, woranga, wovaponisa, Vose vakarasika; Murumbidze!Murumbidze! Mwari anovimbika.
Sababa wotichengeta, Kana tisina simba; Wochengeta mumaoko, Torwirwa kuvavengi,
Murumbidze! Murumbidze! Nengoni dzoyerera.
Ngirozi dzomurumbidza, Dzotarisana naye,
Zuva, mwedzi, zvonamata Zvigereko kudenga; Murumbidze! Murumbidze! Rumbidzai Wenyasha.
Henry Francis Lyte (1793-1857)
O Worship The King, All Glorious
Houghton, 533; Hanover, 531; Landate
Dominum, 534
Namatai Mambo anorubwinyo; Imbai nesimba rudo rwakwe; Iye mudzviviriri nenhowo yedu, Agere muutsvene hune mbiri
Imbai zvesimba nengoni dzake, Ane nguvo, chiedza chedenga,
Kutsamwa kwake, ‘She, kunotinhira, Nzira yake ine rima padutu.
Nyika izere nezvishamiso, Nesimba rake, ‘She, richigere, Rakadaro risingasandurwe,
Zve, wakarikomberedza negungwa.
Ruchengeto rwake rwakakosha, Rwuri mumhepo, nomuchiedza; Rwobva mugomo rwopinda mubani, Rwuri m ‘dova nemvura inonaya.
Vana venyika vasina simba, Maari tinoisa ruvimbo,
Tsitsi nomutsa wake hazvigume, Musiki, mudzikinuri, nehama.
Samasimba, rudo rwakadzama, Ngirozi dzichiimba kudenga; Zvisikwa zvenyika zvisina simba, Norukudzo zvichakuimbirawo.
Robert Grant (1779-1839)
Praise To The Holiest In The Height
Gerontius, 89; Richmond, 125
Ngaarumbidzwe wedenga Napasi pakudze, Namazwi ake matsvene, Nenzira dzeidi.
Ungwaru hwaMwari wedu Hunokunda hwose;
Kritsu wakauya kuti Azotinunura.
Adhamu wakakundika Munyama neropa,
Asi rudo rwake Mwari, Rwakakunda zvose.
Ngaarumbidzwe wedenga, Napasi pakudze; Namazwi ake matsvene, Nenzira dzeidi.
John Henry Newman (1821-77)
Now Thank We All Our God,
Now thank we all our god, 752
Ngatitendei Mwari Nemwoyo yedu yose; Anezvishamiso Zvinoifadza nyika; Kubva pauduku, Watikomborera, Nezvipo zverudo Ndezvedu narinhi.
Upfumi hwaMwari Ngahuve pedyo nesu; Mwoyo ifadziswe, Norugare kwatiri; Tigare mungoni, Dzititungamire, Dzitisunungure
Pano nokudenga
Ngaatendwe Mwari, Ngaarumbidzwe Baba, NoMwanakomana, Naye Mweya Mutsvene; Mwana mumwechete, Wepasi nedenga,
Waive, achave, Nokusingapere.
Martin Rinkart (1856-1649) trs. Catherine Winkworth (1827-78)
Being My Tongue, Some Heavenly Theme
Lydia, 110; Stracathro, 136
Rurimi rwangu, tangisa, Mutsa izwi, imba Zviito nezita guru, ZvaShe, Samasimba.
Udza kuvimbika kwake, Nesimba panyika;
Imba runako rwengoni, Dzeizwi raMwari.
Izwi rengoni nesimba Rakasika Denga; Rinotsigira nyenyedzi, Rotaura zvose.
Mwoyo wangu uchafara, Nadzo tsitsi deznyu, Nezwi iro ndinovimba Rutendo rwogutswa.
Isaac Watts (1647-1748)
Thy Kingdom Come On Bended Knee
Umambo hwenyu ngahuuye! Tohunamatira;
Vatendi, neshungu huru, Vanohumirira.
Kunanayira kwenguva, NdokwaMwari, Baba; Nyenyedzi dzinopupura Simba nenduramo.
Zuva rinopenya kwazvo, Kunze kwotoyedza; Shongai hanzu, vatendi, Nguva yaswedera.
Zuva rinopenya kwazvo, Rodzima zvitadzo; Kururama kuchamiswa Kuporese zvose.
Ruzivo, norunyararo, Zvichafamba kwose; Zuva rake Mwari.
Great Is Thy Faithfulness.
Great is thy faithfulness, 657
Munotendeseka, O Mwari Baba, Hamuna mumvuri wesanduko, Hamungapinduke mutsitsi dzenyu, Saizvozvo, mogara narinhi.
Munotendeseka!Munotendeseka! Mangwanani ndogam’chira tsitsi, Zvose zvandinoda ndopiwa nemi, Munotendeseka, ‘She, kwandiri.
Zhizha, chando napo pakukohwa, Zuva, mwedzi, nyenyedzi pa’msoro, Zvinosangana zvose kupupura Kurudo rwenyu runotendeka.
Toregererwa kwenguva yose, Kuvepo kwenyu kwotungamira; Simba ranhasi neramangwana, Makomborero angu, zvihuru.
Thomas Obediah Chisholm (1866-1960)
All People That On Earth Do Dwell
Old Hundredth, 38 Ab; Tallis, 41 G
Vanhu vose vepanyika, Imbai mose kuna ‘She; Munamatei nokutya, Farisai mberi kwake.
Uyu Mambo, ndiye Mwari; Wakatisika pachake; Anotifudza sehwai,
Tiriwo vedanga rake.
Ngatipinde mberi kwake, Norukudzo norufaro; Tirumbidze zita rake, Zvakakodzera kudaro.
Torumbidzirei Ishe? Azere tsitsi neidi; Chokwadi chake chiripo, Hachipinduke narinhi.
William Kethed (1594)
All Creatures of Our God And King
St. Francis, 45
Zvisikwa zvaMwari Mambo, Ngatiimbe pamwechete, Hareruya!Hareruya!
Newe zuva rinopisa, Newe mwedzi unopenya:
Murumbidze, Murumbidze, Hareruya,Hareruya, Hareruya,!
Iwe mhepo une simba, Imi makore edenga, Murumbidze! Hareruya! Iwe unotonga, rumbidza, Newe manheru imbawo:
Nemvura inoyerera; Imbirawo Ishe anzwe, Hareruya! Hareruya! Moto une simba guru, Wopa kudziya nomwenje:
Ivhu rinotipa zvose Zvatinodya misi yose, Murumbidze! Hareruya! Namaruva nemichero, Ngazviratidze kubwinya:
Zvisikwa ngazvirumbidze, Zvinamate norupfavo, Murumbidze! Hareruya! Baba, Mwana, Mweya Varumbidzwe Hareruya
Francis of Assisi (1182-1226) trs. William Henry Draper (1855-1933)
His Works And His Praise
Lord Thy Word Abideth
Ravenshaw, 774
Ishe, izwi renyu, Rinotitungamira; Kune anotenda, Rinotiponisa,
Mhandu dziri pedyo, Tofadzwa nezwi renyu; Rinotinyaradza, Rinotiponesa.
Mudutu renhamo, Makore okwidiba; Mwenje wovheneka, Wotichengetedza.
Rufarowo here, Pamwe noupfumi, Zvopiwa neshoko Kunawo vatendi!
Izwi rine tsitsi, Rotsigira vapenyu; Ndiro izwi benyu Kwavari murufu.
Dai tichiona
Utsvene hwaro shoko; Ishe, taikutyai,
Tive pedyo nemi.
Henry Williams Baker (1821-77)
Praise The Almighty
Belmont, 76; French, 88
Kudzai Mwari mukuru Rumbidzai mose! Wakatipa gore idzva, Ngaarumbidzwe!
Wakatichengeta iye, Gore rapfuura;
Tose tiri mberi kwake, Nemipiro yedu.
Tinokutendai, Baba, Nedzo tsitsi dzenyu; Tinozvipira kwamuri Nayo mwoyo yedu.
Toda kukurumbidzai Namabasa edu; Toda kutevera Jesu, Tiende kudenga.
6.	Dzose nguva dzatinadzo, Dzive dzenyu, Ishe; Namasimba edu ose, Apirwe kwamuri.
Charles Wesley (1707-88)
The Creator’s Hidden Works
French, 88
Kuita kwake, Musiki, Kwakavanda chose; Anotipa, agotora Vadiwa kwatiri.
Mhuri yokura, yowanda, Mapudzi matsvene;
Asi nenguva isipi, Zvose zvoparara.
Vanoverera serima Rotiza chiedza;
Mumwe nomumwe woenda Kuumambo hwake.
Mwoyo yedu yotambudzwa,
Toshaya kuziva kufunga kwake, Musiki, Nesu kwopesana.
Hatingazive mazano Okuronga kwaShe; Asi toziva, tovimba, Zvose zvichanaka.
Mwari tipeiwo simba Kugam’chira zvose; Nengoni, tichauyawo, Kumusha kudenga.
Solomon M. Mutswairo (1924-)
God Moves In A Mysterious Way
St’ Peter, 129; Belmont, 76; French, 88
Mwari anotishamisa Namabasa ake; Tsoka dzake todziona Padutu, mugungwa.
Iye Mwari ane njere Dzisingakundike, Dziri mumazano ake, Nomukuda kwake.
Imi vatendi shingai, Musatye makore; Anoda kunisa mutsa, Nengoni dzaIshe.
Regai kutonga Ishe, Nokuziva kwenyu; Seri kwezviito zvake Kune ngoni zhinji.
Mazano nokuda kwake Zvinopetenuka;
Pfumvudza nyangwe yovava Ruva royevedza.
Tikasatenda toona ZvaMwari senhando; Asi munaiye Mwari, Munechidudziro
William Cowper (1731-1800)
O Lord, My God!
How great Thou Art!544
Mwari, Mambo, Kana ndofungidzira, Mabasa enyu anoshamisa, Nenyenyedzi, ndonzwa nokuriridza, Nesimba renyu guru panyika.
Ndokuimbirai Mwari M’ponisi Muru M ‘kuru! Mukuru sei!
Ndokuimbirai Mwari M’ponisi, Muri M’kuru! Mukuru sei!
Kana ndofamba musango remiti, Ndonzwa shiri dzinondifadzisa; Ndotarisawo pasi pemakomo, Ndonzwa hova, mhepo yofefeta.
Mwari makatipa Mwanakomana Kutifira: izvi zvoshamisa! Wakatakura zvivi paM’chinjikwa, Wakafa kubvisa zvivi zvangu.
Kristu achazouya, norumuko , Ndoenda kumusha norufaro; Ndichamukudza nokumurumbidza, Ndokudza Mwari, Mukuru sei!
Copyright (c) 1953 Stuart k. Hine, Kingsway’s
(used by permission)
God Is All-powerful
Remington, 42; Duke Street, 17; Pentecost, 40
Mwari, mune simba rose, Tungamirai vafambi
Vari mumweya, mudenga Vadzivirirwe kunjodzi.
Mwari mune zano guru, Chengetai vanofamba Nengarava dzomugungwa; Napasi, ngoro dzemoto.
Mwari mutongi wazvose, Podzai hasha dzemheni; Mvura zhinji ituruke, Vanhu nenzara vasafe.
Mwari itai marudzi Asagadzire mabhomba, Zvombo zvizhinji zvouraya Vanhu nezviri panyika.
Mwari, itai Musiki womunhu, Anotonga zviri pasi;
Mupei gwara kuronga Zvorudo, norunyararo.
Solomon M. Mutswairo (1924-)
Let Us With a Gladsome Mind
Monkland 286: Theodora 297
Nemwoyo inofara, Ngatirumbidze Ishe: Ane tsitsi narinhi, Anotendeka chose.
Ngatiparidze kwose Kuti ndiMwari ega, Ane tsitsi narinhi, Anotendeka chose.
Iye nesimba guru Wakatipachiedza: Ane tsitsi narinhi, Anotendeka chose.
Anokonzera zuva Kuvamba rwendo rwaro! Ane tsitsi narinhi, Anotendeka Chose.
Noruoko rwake ‘She Zvose zvogutswa naye: Anetsitsi narinhi, Anotendeka chose.
John Milton (1608-74)
Thanks Be To God
Regent Square; 423
Ngatimutendei Mwari, M’siki wezvinhu zvose; Ndiye mumisi werudzi Nomoto une simba, Izwi rakazvitaura; Ngaarumbidzwe Mwari.
Mwari ngaatendwe nezwi Rakaumba munhu;
Kufa, asi nokumuka, Nengoni dzokudenga. Izwi rakazvitaura; Ngaarumbidzwe Mwari.
Mwari ngaatendwe nezwi Riri muMweya M’tsvene; Tine rufaro rukuru, Nokununurwa kwedu. Izwi rake rinodaro, Ngaarumbidzwe Mwari.
R.T. Brooks (1918-)
Before Jehovah’s Awful Throne
Old Hundredth, 38; Sounding Praise, 51
Pachigaro ChaJehovha, Ndudzi zhinji dzipfugame; Dzizive Ishe ndiMwari, Wosika nokuparadza.
Simba rake iye woga Wakatiumba savanhu, Sehwai patarasika, Wotidzorera mudanga.
Pamasuwo tichaimba, Tosimudza mazwi edu, Pasi, nedzo ndimi zhinji, Dzozadza nokurumbidza.
Hutungamiri hukuru, Norudo rusingapere, Chokwadi, sedombo, mira, Kusvikira kumagumo.
Isaac Watts (1674-1748)
alt.John Wesley (17-91)
Morning Has Broken
Morning has broken; 735
Pamambakwedza Ekutangisa,
Shiri yoimba Yokutanga; Inorumbidza Pamangwanani, Inodudzira Shoko raShe.
Mvura yonaya Yobva kudenga; Dova pauswa Hwokutanga; Totenda mvura Iri mubindu, Inobvinina Paafamba
Rangu izuva, Nemangwanani, Zvavakaonekwa MuEdheni, Ngatirumbidze Pamangwanani, Mwari wasika Zuva idzva.
Eleanor Fairjeon (1881-1965)
What Shall I Do, My God To Love?
Stacathro, 136
Ndingamude sei, Mwari, Kuti ndimukudze? Ndiparidze noukuru Hwadzo ngoni dzake.
Ngoni dziri kuna vose, Hadziverengeki; Dzinoramba dzisingafe, Dzosvikira vose.
Dzinoziva pasi pose, Hadzina magumo;
Dai dzakapfu’ra mumwe, Dzaindipfu’rawo
Udzamo hworudo rwake Hungarehwe nani? Chipo Chisingataurwe Ndozochiratidzwa.
Chimbidzai, Ishe, mutore Ini ndive wenyu;
Ita mumwoyo mangu, ‘She, chitongero chenyu.
Charles Wesley (1707-88)
His Love
God’s Love To Me Is Wonderful?
God’s love to me is wonderful, 150
Rudo rwaMwari rukuru, Zvokuti anonzwa
Kushaya kwomwoyo wangu, Wobisa misodzi;
Nyangwe ndisinganzwisise Udzamo hwerudo, Wochengeta mweyawangu, Haangakundike.
Mwari anerudo Rudo rwoshamisa,
Wakapa Mwana wake Kuti andifire,
Rudo rwoshamisa.
Rudo rwaMwari rukuru, Kwose kwondoenda, Kukahadzika kwasvika, Ndom’bata ruoko. Rudo runotanda kutya, Ndakasunungurwa,
Nenzeve dzangu ndinonzwa Izwi rinofadza.
Rudo rwaMwari rukuru, Wochenesa nzira;
Zvino ndawadzana naye, Zvisingazopera.
Baba haandikumbire Zvipo zvakakurisa; Asi kuti ndimudise, Nokumushandira.
Sidney Edward Cox (1887-1975)
Joyful, Joyful, We Adore Thee
Europe, 435
Norufaro tokukudza Mwari, Ishe worudo; Mwoyo yedu yovhurura Semaruva muzuva. Bisai, kusuwa, nezvivi, Zvibvisei kwatiri,
Imi mupi worufaro, Tizadzei nechiyedza.
Mabasa enyu panyika Nedenga anofadza, Nyenyedzi, nadzo ngirozi, Dzogarokupembedzai. Minda, masango, makomo, Nemapani negungwa; Shiri, nematsime, zvose Zvofara pamwe nesu.
Mopa nokuregerera, Munotikomborera; Tsime rorufaro rwedi, Rwakadzama segungwa.
Baba, ndimi Kritsu, hama, Vane rudo ndevenyu, Tidzidzisei kudanana Norudo rutsvene.
Vapenyu imbai rwiyo Rwokuyedza kwokunze; Rudo rwaBaba rwotonga Hama nomunhu wose. Ngatifambe tichiimba Sevakundi mukurwa; Kuimba kwotisimudza, Tokunda muupenyu.
Henry Van Dyke (1852-1933)
The King Of Love My Sheperd Is
Dominus regit me, 353; St Columba, 356
Mambo, Mufudzi norudo Rusingakundikane, Handina chondoshayiwa, Ari wangu narinhi.
Kumvura dzinoupenyu, Anonditungamira; Nokumafuro manyoro, Wondigutsa nokudya.
Ndichiri nzenza, chirema, Murudo wonditsvaka; Wakandiisa papfudzi, Kumusha wondiunza.
Napakufa handingatye, ‘She, ari pedyo neni; Mudonzvo wondinyaradza Mberi kwomuchinjikwa.
Napamisi yangu yose, Runako haruperi; Mufudzi, ndokuimbira, Mumba mako narinhi.
Henry Williams Baker (1821-77)
The Lord’s My Shepherd
Crimond, 82; My Shepherd, 115
Jehovah, Mufudzi wangu, Anondigarisa,
Mumafuro nepamvura Inondifadzisa.
Anorapa mweya wangu, Kuti ndifambiswe
Pane nzira dzenduramo, Nezve zita rake.
Kunyange ndiri pakufa, Handina chokutya, Nokuti imi muneni, Nokundinyaradza.
Tafura yangu yazadzwa Pavanondivenga;
Musoro wangu wazodzwa, Mukombe wazara.
Tsitsi dzenyu norunako Zvinoenda neni; Ndichazogara naMwari Narinhi, narinhi.
Scottish Psalter (1650)
If Human Hearts Are Often Tender
How Much More, 25
Kana tine mwoyo munyoro, Tichinzwira vamwe tsitsi, Norudo ruzere runako, Nemaoko ano mutsa.
Kangani Mwari Baba wedu, Murudo voregerera; Kangani Mwari Baba wedu, Votipa zvishayo zvedu.
Ko, kanganiko Mwari Baba Murudo woregerera?
Ko, kanganiko Mwari Baba Asina waanonyima?
Vamwe vanobatsira vamwe Nezvipo zvinomborambwa, Vanobata mhandu sehama Norudo rusingatendwe.
Vamwe vogovana rufaro, Vonzwa kuchemakwevana, Vanhu kusuwa vonzwirana, Misodzi vopisikana.
John Gowans
Dear Lord, And Father OF Mankind

Duke Street, 17; Rimington ,42
Jesu achatonga kwese Kunovhenekera zuva; Ushe hwake huchagara, Dakara rinhi narinhi.
Marudzi ose evanhu Anoimba rudo rwake; Nawo mazwi avadiki, Anokudza zita rake.
Anawo makomborero, Vasungwa vanonunurwa; Vakaneta vozorodzwa, Varombo vokomborerwa.
Paanoratidza simba Kurapa hapana rufu; Maari vanhu vowana Makomborero mazhinji.
Zvisikwa zvose zviunze Rukudzo kuna ‘She Mambo, Ngirozi dziburukire Dziimbe pamwe nenyika.
Isaac Watts (1674-1748)
Jesus Comes, Let All Adore Him
Ottawa, 462
Jesu wouya, ngaakudzwe, ‘She wetsitsi norudo, Gadzirai nzira yake, Ngairurame kwazvo, Nomugwenga ivemo,
Itai nzira ya’She.
Jesu wouya nom’bayiro, Pasave nemipata, Kubwinya kwaMwari kuve Kunokunda makomo. Mazwi akwazise’She,
Ati: hona Jehovha!
Jesu Kristu anouya Wofamba nomurenje; Umambo hwake hwokura Paisave nechinhu; Gwenga richazofara
Rapfekedzwa runako.
Jesu wauya paive Minzwa miti yokura, Yakasimwapo naIshe, Ine michero kwazvo, Yokura nhivi dzose
Kwese kwese.
Jesu wouya! nehova Dzichabva kumakomo; ‘She, wozarura matsime Kudiridza mapani Wopfu’ra nyika dzose Dzoziva simba rake.
Thomas Kelly (1769-1855)
O Disclosem Thy Lovely Face
Ramsgate, 312; Rousseau, 314; Tynndal, 317
Onesai uso hwenyu, Vandudzai simba rangu, Zvino ndafa, nenyota, Senyika yakaoma;
Uyai zvino, kwandiri, Uyai M’ponisi, uyai.
kana imi musipo, Zuva rova nerima; Haufadze musi ‘wo,
Kunze kwewenyu mutsa; Ndipei chiedza chenyu, Dziisai mwoyo wangu.
Ndishanyirei mumweya, Mubise zvakaipa; Vhenekerai panzira, Paradzai kusatenda, Rambai muchioneka, Nokusingazopera.
Kristu Ishe wedenga, Kristu idi, chiedza, Zuva dzvene robuda, Rinorikunda rima,
Richabva nokum’soro, Senyenyedzi rosvika.
Charles Wesley (1707-88)
There Is A Holy Hill Of God
Behold yhe Saviour, 85Eb; Auld Lang Syne, 73G
Riripo gomo raMwari, Mweya woriona; Ndinoda kurisvikira, Ndisiye zvenyika.
Zvanza mwoyo ngazvichene, Kuzvida ndirege,
Ndinzwe ndipei rudo Ishe, Ngandigare nemi.
Handizvide zviyevedzo Zvikuru zvenyika; Ndinozviregera zvose, Ndiwane zvedenga.
Ndoda ropafadzo raShe, Vake vanopiwa; Ndinodawo ururami Hwavanogamchira.
Ngandikwire gomo dzvene, Mandikodzeresa;
Ndimire munzvimbo tsvene
Umo ndigoshanda.
William Drake Penniek (1884-1944)
I Will Sing The Wondrous Story
I will sing the wondrous story, 381
Ndichaimba nyaya tsvene YaKristu wakandifira; Wakasiya denga dzvene, Kuzofa paKarivhari.
Hungu, ndichaimba shoko RaKristu wakandifira; Navatsvene vokudenga Vachaungana naye.
Jesu wandiwana ini Hwai yakarasika; Norudo wandifungata, Kundidzora munzira.
Ndakarapiwa naJesu Ndisina nesimba; Ndiri bofu, ndinokutya Wakandisunungura.
Nguva dzerima dzineni; Nokusuwa munzira; Asi Ishe achineni Ndotungamirwa naye.
Achave neni, dakara Rukova rwayerera; Ipapo wondiyambutsa, Kune vadiwa vake.
Francis Harold Rawley (1854-1952)(verses)
Let Me Love Thee
Let me love Thee, 439; Blaenwern, 430
Ngandikude, unoziva Zviri mumwoyo wangu; Rudo urwo rwune simba, Rukupe zvose zvangu, Mitoro yoreruka, Kusuwa kunopera,
Kana zvoitirwa Ishe, Nokufarira iwe.
Ngandikude Ishe, Utore mwoyo wangu, Nyasha dzako chete, Dzougutsa mweya.
Ngandikude zvionekwe, Zvawakandiitira; Ndiyamure ndigotenda, Ndichiona Karivhari, Ngandione rudo rwenyu, Runyadze zvivi zvangu, Nokutambudzika kwenyu; Rudzikinuro rwangu.
Ngandikude, Ndigofara, Kana ndichikudisisa; Mukufara, mukusuwa, Ndingawane zororo.
Rudo runorerukisa Kusuwa nokurwadzwa; Rudo haruchazobvunza, Ruchakunda mukurwa.
Herbert Howard Booth (1862-1926)
Love Divine, All Loves Excelling
Blaenwern, 430G; salvator, 443G
Rudo runokunda rwose, Norufaro rwedenga, Mukati medu mugare Sezva makavimbisa, Jesu, mune tsitsi dzose, Muri rudo rutsvene Tishanyirei, tiponesei Garai mumwoyo yose.
Uyai, Mununuri wedu, Ngatinzwe ngoni dzenyu; Musambotisiya isu, Temberi tsvene dzenyu. Tinozokurumbidzai, Nokukushandirai, Tichazokutunhidzai, Rudo rwenyu rukudzwe.
Pedzisa basa renyu, Tive tisina zvivi; Tione ruponiso Rwadzoserwa mamuri.
Tosandurwa mukubwinya, Tosvika’ko kudenga, Toisa korona pasi, Murudo, tokukudzai.
Charles Wesley (1707-88)
O Master, Let Me Walk With Thee
Maryton, 33; Anelus, 6; Warehan, 55
Tenzi, ngandifambe nemi, Mubasa ndizvideredze, Ndibatsirei kutakura Mitoro nezvinonetsa.
Ngandisimbaradze vamwe, Nezwi rerudo rutsvene; Ngandidzore varasiki, Vatungamirwe kudenga.
Ndipeiwo mwoyo murefu, Ndiwadzane nemi, Ishe; Ndikushandirei nesimba Rinokunda zvakaipa.
Netariro ivheneke Nzira’yo yezviri mberi; Murugare rwenyu chete. Ngandipe upenyu hwangu.
Washington Gladden (1836-1918)
The Holy Spirit
Thou Christ Of Burning, Cleaning Flame
Tucker, 335, Salvator, 443
Kristu, moto woutsvene, Mutume moto’yo worudo. Toda chipo chamatenga, Mutume moto’yo worudo. Hondo iyi mutarise, Mweya wenyu ngauuye, Toda kuti titsveniswe, Nomoto, nomoto worudo.
Mwari waErija, tinzwei, Mutume moto’yo worudo, Mutiite tirurame,
Mutume moto’yoworudo Kuipa kwedu kupiswe, Ruvhenekero rupinde, Izvi zvose ngazviitwe, Nomoto, nomoto worudo.
Toda moto, tokumbira Mutume moto’yo worudo. Muchatipa zvatinoshaya, Mutume moto’yo worudo Tipei simba tirurame, Tipeiwo ngoni tikunde, Tepeiwo kuti ticheniswe, Nomoto, nomoto worudo.
Tisimbisei, tiyamure, Mutume moto’yo worudo Vatadzi ngavaponiswe,
Mutume moto’yoworudo. Tozvipira mberi kwenyu, Nezvinhu zvosewo zvedu, Zvitsveniswe nomweya wenyu, Nomoto, nomoto worudo.
E. Booth - Tucker (1953-1929)
Holy Spirit, Truth Divine
Weber, 301; St . Bees, 293
Mweya Mutsvene, idi, Penya mumwoyo mangu, Izwi raShe nomwenje Rindimutse ndione.
Mweya Mutsvene, rudo. Penya mumwoyo mangu; Mutsa chido chikuru, Bisa kuzvida kwangu.
Mweya M’tsvene, chokadi Tonga mukati mangu;
Iva Ishe, undipe Simba ndisununguke.
Mweya M’tsvene, rugare Nyaradza mwoyo wangu; Taura upfavise, Murudzikamo rwako
Mweya M’tsvene, rufaro, Fadziso mwoyo wangu; Mugwenga ndinoimba, Uve tsime narinhi
Samuel Longfellow (1819-92)
Come , Holy Spirit
Nottingham, 289; Consecration, 279;
Randolph. 292
Mweya Mutsvene, uya Senjiva, kuna Kristu; Burukira pandiri, Sendimi, paPendekositi.
Mweya waMwari zadza Pfungwa, muviri wangu, Nomoto worutendo, Wevapostori vako.
Mweya weidi, svika; Tisaudzime, kwete: Tiparidze nesimba, Tirape vanorwara
Mweya waMwari M’penyu Senjiva, uya zvino; Takapfugama, tipe:
Pendekositi itsva.
Solomon M. Mutsvairo (1924-)

hymn.title: MWEYA WORUTENDO
lyrics: Spirit Of Faith, Come Down
Dennis, 165; St Ethenlwald, 174; Shirland, 176
Mweya worutendo, Chitiburukira
Tiratidze Mwari, Mambo, Pupura neropa
Anotiponisa, Meso aonese; Wakafira vakaipa, Wakandifirazve.
Naizvozvo tonzwa Kununurwa kwedu, Tino imba nokufara: Muri mwari wedu.
Femera rutendo, Rugogamuchirwa,
Rugopa mukati medu, Kwedu kupupura.
Rutendo rwokunda Rwobisa makomo;
Runovaponisa vanhu, Runovapa rudo.
Charles Wesley (1707-88)
Breath On Me, Breath Of God
Trentham, 180; Carlisle, 164
Ndifemerei, Mwari Noupenyu hutsva
Kuti ndiite zvamunoda, Ndigoitawo semi.
Ndifemerei Mwari Dakara ndachena,
Ndide chinhu pamwe nemi, Ndizoshingirira.
Ndifemerei Mwari Ndive wenyu chose,
Hupenyu hwangu hwepasi, Hupenyeswe nemi.
Ndifemerei, Mwari, Kugoti ndisafe,
Asi ndigogara nemi, Narinhi narinhi.
Edwin Hatch(1835-89)
For The Mighty Moving Of Thy Spirit
For the mighty moving of Thy Spirit, 646
Nokufambawo kwoMweya wenyu Mumwoyo yedu nguva dzose; Nokunyaradza kwoMweya wenyu, Zvatangatotya nokusuwa:
Tokukudzai, Baba wedu Tokutendai, Baba wedu Tokurumbidzai, Baba wedu, Nomuteuro
Nokuraya kwoMweya wenyu Totsvaka nzira yakareruka; Totungamirwa noMweya wengu,
Nero samba rokuteerera.
Nokupfavisa kwoMweya wenyu Wakatidzora tarasika. Kukurudzira kwoMweya wenyu
Hatikahadziki munzira.
John Gowans
Our Blest Redeemer
St. Cuthbert, 779
Pakuenda kwoM’ponisi Achiwonekedza, akativimbisa isu Mutungamiri.
Wakauyawo senjiva, Achibhururuka; Kupa utsvene norudo Nokwatiri.
Wakauyazve , semoto Kuzotidzidzisa; Wakauyawo semhepo, Isoonekwa
Wakauya nerunako, Mushanyi womutsa;
Kuzozorora mumwoyo Wakapfava.
Izwi rake tinorinzwa Rakapfava chose; Rotanda kutya, roreva
Zvokudenga.
Kururama kwatinako, Nokukunda kwose, Nepfungwawo dzoutsvene,
Ndezvake ‘She.
Mweya Mustvene, womutsa, Takarukutika,
Garawo mumwoyo yedu, Tikodzere.
Harriette Auber (1173-1862)
Blessed Lamb Of Calvary
Spanish Chant, 315 Ab; Who is He? 319Ab
Gwayana reKarivheri Tumai mweya kwandiri Zvino undishambidze Ndicheneswe sechando, Kuti upenyu hwangu Hakufadzisei, Ishe
Bisai kuzvida kwose, Kuda kwenyu kuitwe; Rudo rwangu rubvire
Nomweya, rutsveniswe; Kuti upenyu hwangu Hukuwanire vanhu.
Ndidzidzisei kurwisa, Nokukunda zvitema; Ndipeiwo mutsa kuti
Ndinzwire vamwe tsitsi; Ngandizadzwe norudo Ndikushandirei, Ishe.
Barbara Stoddart (1865-1915)
Blessed Saviour, Now Behold Me
Breathe upon me, 363; I must have the Savour withme. 376
Muponisi, nditarisei Pasi petsoka dzenyu;
Ndedzenyu tsitsi femerai, Ndiitei ndizadziswe.
Ndifemerei neniwo, Ndiitei ndikodzere, Femerai netsitsi dzenyu, Ndiitei ndizadziswe.
Torai unhu hwangu hwose, Neropa hwakatengwa, Mandiregerera zvivi, Ngandikushandirei, ‘She.
Mumazuva angu ose Musimba, m’kusasimba; Zvipo zvishoma zvizhinji, Jesu, ndokupai zvose.
Muupenyu tungamira, Mukufa muve neni; Nesimba renyu ndokunda, Ndotakura M’chinjikwa.
William Baugh (1852-1942)
Spirit Divine, Attend Our Prayers
Irish, 998; Martyrdom, 113
Mweya Mutsvene, tinzweiwo, Gara muno mumba;
Burukai zvino nesimba, Uya Mweya, uya.
Ratidzawo sechiedza, Zvourombe hwedu; Tungamirai nzira dzose, Koenda vatsvene.
Uyai, serimi remoto, Muchenese mwoyo; Mweya yedu ngaipirwe KuM’ponisi wedu.
Uyai, sedova munatse Uku kuzvipira;
Kushaya kwedu kugutswe Namasimba enyu.
Uyai senjiva, zarura Mapapiro orudo; Vanhu pasi pano vave,
Sevari kudenga.
Andrew Reed (1787-1862)
Gracious Spirit, Dwell With Me
Wells 318; Ratisbon, 313; Dix, 306
Mweya wengoni, garai Neni ndive netsitsi, Namazwi anorapa, Muonekwe mandiri; Nezviito zvakapfava Zvipupurire Kristu.
Weidi, garai neni. Kuti ndive neidi, Nouchenjeri hwenyu, Huonekwe mandiri; Zviito noushamwari,
Zvireve zva’She wangu,
Womutsa, garai neni, Mutsa uve mandiri; Ndinzwire vanhu tsitsi; Ndivakwezve kuna’She, Nomutsa vauyiswe Kutsoka dzaJesu, ‘She.
Wesimba, garai neni, Kuti ndisimbiswewo; Pandakundika ndoga, Ngandipiwe kukunda; Tariro yakasimba Ngainditsungisewo.
Mutsvene, Garai neni, Kuti nditsveniswewo; Kutsauka muzvivi, Nokuda zvakanaka; Nazvose zvandingave Ndipe wakandipawo.
Thomas Toke Lynch (1818-71)
Come, Holy Ghost, All Sacred Fire
Beethoven 9, Arizon 7
Uyai, Mweya woutsvene, Ndizadzisei mweya wangu, Bisai zvakaipa zvose, Mugare mukati mangu.
Ndizadzisei mweya wangu, Zve nendangariro dzangu, Kuti ndiwanikwe zvangu, Ndichiita kuda kwenyu.
Zvaitwa! Mauya zvenyu; Kwamuri ndinopa mweya, Mwoyo wangu imba yenyu, Ndogarira ini moga.
Chipo change chagam’chirwa, Nom’towo weropa rake; Maoko ndatambanudza, Kugoti ndiropafadzwe.
Charles Wesley (1707-88)
The Trinity
Holy, Holy, Holy
Nicaea, 748
M’tsvene,M’tsvene, M’tsvene, ‘She Samasimba!
Pamangwanangwana toimba kwamuri; M’tsvene,M’tsvene,M’tsvene
Wetsitsi nesimba,
Mwari, utatumumwe utsvene.
M’tsvene,M’tsvene, M’tsvene, Vatsvene vokudza;
Voisa ngundu dzavo pasi dzinobwinya; Pagungwa rinopenya,
Ngirozi navatsvene vokunamatai, Ndimi maive, muri narinhi.
M’tsvene,M’tsvene, M’tsvene, Movanzwa merima;
Vatadzi havangaoni kubwinya Ndimi M’tsvene moga; Hapanazve mumwe,
Ane simba, rudo no’utsvene,
M’tsvene,M’tsvene, M’tsvene, ‘She Samasimba!
Mabasa enyu otunhidza zita renyu; M’tsvene, M’tsvene, M’tsvene, Wetsitsi nesimba,
Mwari, Utatumumwe hutsvene.
Reginald Heber (1783-1826)
O Father And Creator
Hosanna, 255; St Theodulph, 262
O Baba, noMusiki Worudo rutsvene, Uyai makazara Burukai kudenga Makapa mwana wenyu Kuti andifire.
Ndinokupfugamirai, Zvose ndokupirai.
O Kristu, Mununuri, Zvose makandipa, Neropa renyu, Ishe, Kundisunungura.
Ndidzidzisei kukupai Muviri nepfungwa; Muuye norunako Kuzadzisa mwoyo wangu.
Naye Mweya M’tsvene, Murovese hana!
Mandiri uyai mugare Mundisimbaradze.
Mwenje uchivheneka, Nzira yooneswa;
Garai, O Mweya M’nyoro, Ndive nechokwadi.
Albert E. Chesham (1886-1971)
Come, Thou Almighty King
Harlen, 215, Moscow 217
Uyai, ‘Samasimba’, Ti’mbe zita renyu, Tikukudzei;
Baba worubwinyo, Mukundi wazvose, Uyai mutonge, ‘She wekare.
Uyai, ‘Shoko benyu’, Mushonga munondo, Tinamate;
Natsai vanhu venyu, ‘Zwi renyu rikunde, Mweya woutsvene, Uyai zvino.
Uyai, ‘Munyaradzi, Pupurai utsvene Nguva ino; Wamasimba ose Tongai mwoyo yose, Musazotisiya Mweya Mutsvene.
KuVatatumumwe, Kudzwai narinhi, Misi ose, Noumambo hwenyu, Tione murubwinyo; Tikudze norudo, Narinhiwo.
The Christian Life
The Gospel Call
Hark! The Gospel News Is Sounding
Rhondda, 141; Face To Face, 370
Inzwa dama revhangeri Kristu wafa pamuti; Hova dzetsitsi izhinji, Ngoni zve dzepachena;
Zvino m’tadzi, zvino m’tadzi, Ona wakakufira.
Kunero gomo, mhanyira, Wana bako maari;
‘She wokukoka kutsime, Uyawo ushambidzwe; Kurumidza, kurumidza, Uya kwaari zvino.
Ngoni dziri kuyerera, Zviuru zvakapiwa; Dzichayerera narinhi, Kubva padivi raShe; Hapana kufa, Hapana! Kristu wakatifira.
Kristu, ‘She, mugove wedu, Tosangana kudenga; Tichashamba mugungwaro Rudo rwoMuponisi;
Utsvene hwake, Utsvene hwake,
Tichagarohuziva.
Henry Frances
The Lord Is King I Own His Power
Simeon, 49; Whitburn, 58; Harton-Lea, 20;
Llangollen, 32
Ishe, Mambo,simba rangu Otanga zvemisi yose; Mwoyo nechido ndezvangu; Zvaanoda, ndazadzisa.
Anoda kutsvenisa Mwoyo wangu mukuipa; Anotora changu chido, Ndimuterere norudo.
Anoda maoko angu Aite zvine chimiro, Anodazve tsoka dzangu
Dzifambe naye munzira.
Miromo anoidazve,
Kuve namazwi matsvene; Zvose zvomupfungwa dzangu, Zvifadzise Mambo wangu.
Anoda uduku hwangu, Nokuvavarira idi; Zvandinogona kuita; Izvi zvigomushandira.
Ishe, kwamuri ndouya, Ndosunungurwa mubasa; Muchandipa basa rangu, Mwoyo, upenyu, ndezvenyu.
Darley Terry (1847-1933)
Dear Lord, I Do Surrender
To the uttermost He saves 267; Rutherford, 260
Ishe, ndinozvipira Pachangu kwamuri; Nguva nendangariro Dzaibatwa neni.
Ndanzwa kudaidzira Kwenyika, nokwenyu, Nditumei kuyamura, Ndiripo ‘She wangu.
Ndiripo ‘She, nditumei, Ndiripo ‘She, nditumei, Ndinozvipira ndichiterera, Ndiripo ‘She, nditumei,
Kare handakakudai, Ndakazvida bedzi, Asi, ndakatarisa Vanhu varasiki.
Zvino handingasiye Mweya yavatadzi, Vashandiri vashoma, Mabasa mazhinji.
Inzwai, Mwari weDenga Zvivimbiso zvangu; Kwamuri ndozvipira Noupenyu hwangu.
Kunyange ndichizvidzwa Neshamwari dzangu, Ndinokupai muviri, Diramhamba rangu.
Jesus Calls us
Galilee, 371; Cross Of Jesus, 366
Jesu anotidaidza Mudutu roupenyu, Misi yose tonzwa izwi Richiti: nditevere.
Vapostori vakarinzwa Pagungwa reGarariya, Vosiya misha nehama; Nokuda kwake iye.
Jesu anotidaidza Kubva mune zvenyika, Kubva kuzvifananidzo Achiti : ungandide.
Murufaro, mukusuwa, Mubasa, muzororo; Nomunhamo, anodana Timude pane zvose.
Netsitsi anotidana, M’posisi ngatikunzwe, Tipe mwoyo titevere, Tikude pane zvose.
Cecil Frances Alexander (1818-95)
Jesus, I My Cross Have Taken
I will follow thee, my Saviour, 378: Bethany. 429
Jesu, ndatora M’chinjikwa Kuti ndikuteverei; Kunyange ndiri kuzvidzwa, Muchave zvangu zvose.
Ndichakutevera Jesu Makafira mhosva yangu, Kana vamwevokuzvidzai, Ndichakutevera bedzi.
Zvandaida ngazvipfuure Zvandaitsvaka zvose; Ndine pfuma isingafe, Ndina Mwari nedenga.
Venyika vangandizvidze, Vakatosiya Mwari;
Vanhu vangandinyengedze, Imi, muri weidi.
Kana muchindifarira, ‘She werudo nesimba, Vangandiseme vavengi, Muri chiedza change
Nhamo haindikuvadze, Ndichine rudo rwenyu; Rufaro rune rugare, Ndirwo runobva kwenyu.
Henry Frances Jas L. Elginburg
God Send Us Men,
Just as I am , 474: Misericordia, 475
Mwari, tumirai vanhu Vasingatende zvenhema; Vane mirau yaKristu, Mupfungwa nomumabasa.
Mwari, tumirai vachenjeri, Vadudzire shoko renyu; Dakara kuda kwaKristu Kuve mirau yenyika.
Mwari, tumai vashingi, Vakagwinya, vasingatye, Zviri mberi, vanoona, Vanoda kukushandirai.
Mwari, tumai vane mwoyo Inovenga zvakaipa;
Ndiwo magamba enyika; Ndivo musimboti wayo.
(PH) F.J. Gillman (1866-1949)

hymn.title: NDAKADANWA NAJESU
lyrics: I have Been Called By Jesus
Beneath the cross of Jesus, 618; Aurelia, 246
Ndakadanwa naJesu Kuva muparidzi; Nomuutsvene hake Kuva mupostori; Ndotora Muchinjikwa, Handinyadzwe nawo; Handisisina musha, Wokurinza musoro.
Sokudana kwaJesu, Vadzidzi vekare; Pagungwa reGarari, Vakasiya zvose; Wakavaita, ivo, Vabvuvi vavanhu; Neni, tenzi, ndiite, Mubvuvi wavanhu.
Ndichipingudzwa pano, Nditsvake ruzivo; Ndidzidziswe udzamo Hwedama renyu, ‘She. Ndisave anoshorwa Pamberi pavanhu, Ndiite ndikodzere Muruzivo rwedi.
Vazhinji vakauya Vakamboshevedzwa; Asi vashoma voga Vamakasarudza. Ishe, neni ngandive Musarudzwa wenyu; Ndisave mudududzi, Wevhangeri renyu.
Solomon N. Mutswairo (1924-)
I’m Set Apart For Jesus
My soul is now united, 257; Aurelia, 246; The Crimson Stream, 266
Ndakasarudzwa naJesu, Kuti ndive wake;
Iye upenyu hwangu, Ndanzwa rudo rwake, Ndakatsaukaniswa, Mukuipa kwose, Zvose ndinozvipira Kuna Mwari, Ishe.
Ndasarudzwa naJesu, Anondichengeta; Ndomupa mwoyo wangu Anoushambidza.
Hatitsaukaniswe, Tiri mumwechete, Nokuti ndiri wake, Ari wangu, Iye.
Ndasarudzwa naJesu, Naye ndigogara; Anondisunungura, Mhandu anotanda; Anondipa masimba, Mukuedzwa kwose; Naye nokuzvipira, Ndingakunde nyika.
William James Pearson (1832-92)
Who Is On The Lord’s Side
Armageddon, 200; Rachie, 207
Ndiani muKristu? Abatire Ishe?
Ndiani anoda Kuwana vamwe? Ndiani wosiya Zvinhu zvenyika? Ndiani muKritsu, Anomurwira?
Nom’towo waIshe, Nomutsa wake, Tiri vashandiri VaKristu Ishe.
Hatide kukudzwa, Kana nokugadzwa; Asi, tasarudza Nzira yokurwa, Nom’towo wokuda, Vaakafira, Waanodaidza, Anomurwira.
Jesu matitenga Pasina ndarama; Asi ropa renyu Ratinunura.
Gomborero renyu Rotizadzisa, Nemi tinobvuma Tasunungurwa.
Kurwa naSatani Ndiko kukukutu; Asi ichakunda Hondo yaKristu. Pasi pomureza Tiri kurwira, Neizwi raJesu Tinozokunda.
Tenzi, tichengetei Nendoni dzenyu, Kuti tigorwira ‘She, tiri venyu.
I’ll Go In The Strength Of The Lord
Thou Shepherd of Israel, 487; In the strength of the Lord, 485
Ndoenda nesimba raShe, Munzira dzaagadzira; Ndotevera shoko rake, Handitye kunyange njodzi, Kwari ini ndoenda,
Iye achapa zvose, Kusvika rwendo rwapera Ndichagarovimba naye.
Ndoenda, ndoenda, ndoenda nesimba Ndoenda nesimba raShe,
Ndoenda, ndoenda, ndoenda nesimba Ndoenda nesimba raShe.
Ndoenda nesimba raShe, Kubasa raanondipa; Rufaro rwaanondipa Rwondimutsurura mweya; Iye wondidzivirira, Nesimba wondichengeta, Ndovimba nesimba rake, Ndogara murudo rwake.
Ndoenda nesimba raShe, Norutendo muzviedzo, Ngoni dzake dzova nhowo. Kutsunga kwokurudzira, Sezvo achitungamira, Mukusangana nemhandu, Nebakatwa rechokwadi, Mukutambura ndokunda.
Edward Turney (1816-72)
Mine To Rise When Thou Dost Call Me
I will follow thee my Saviour, 378; Let the lower lights be burning , 386 Mine and Thine, 388
Ndosimuka, mandidana Munzira youpenyu; Ndichipota kwese kwese, Ndichiuya kwamuri.
Ndiri wenyika Ishe Tenzi. Ndokuteverai kwese.
Muri wangu, Kristu Ishe, Muyamuri nehama!
Ndokuteverai murima, Kristu motungamira; Ndoedza kukunda nhamo, Mozarura musuwo.
Munhamo, ndonyemwerera, Mondifadza ndakundwa; Ndonwa mvura yepaMara Imi moinakisa.
Moratidza zvemagumo Emhiko dzangu dzose; Ndopa mweya nomuviri Zvive zvenyu narinhi.
Susie Swift
By The Peaceful Shores Of Galilee
Follow thou me, 645
Pagungwa’ro reGarariya, Vachisona usvasvi pagungwa, Vabvuvi voshanda misi yose, Dzamara Tenzi asvika nepo.
Nditevere anoshe’dza, Ndinokuitai vabvuvi; Semazuva apaGarariya, Jesu anotishevedza.
Vakasiya zvose vanzwa izwi, Ndokumutevera Tenzi; Vakashanda naye pamwechete Kudzora vanhu kuna Baba.
Izwi rake torinzwa nhasi, Richadana vanhu sekare; Kunge vabvuvi paGarariya, Siya zvose! Nditevere.
Sidney Edward Cox (1887-1975)
Down In The Valley With My Saviour
Follow me, 644
Pasi, munhika ndofamba noM’ponisi, Maruva opfumvudza, mvura yoyerera, Kwose kwose ini ndichazomutevera Mutsoka dzake ndichawana ngundu.
Ndom’tevera, ndom’tevera Jesu, Kupiko, kweseko, ndomutevera ; Ndom’tevera, ndom’tevera Jesu, Kwese kwese ini ndomutevera.
Pasi, munhika ndofamba noM’ponisi, Mune madutu anobvundura mvura, Noruoko rwake handina chandingatye, Njodzi hadzityise ‘She ari pedyo.
Pasi, munhika nepm’soro pegomo, Pedyo noM’ponisi mweya wochengetwa; Wotungamira munzira dzaakafamba, Pavakaungana pagomo ra’She.
William Orcutt Cushing (1823-1903)

hymn.title: KUKOKWA
lyrics: Invitation
Return, O Wanderer
Lover of the Lord, 109; Abridge, 69
Chidzoka, iwe mufambi, Tsvaka Baba wako; Zvido zvitsvawo mauri Naye zvaiswamo.
Wakafanira kumuda, Ishe (katatu)
Zvimwe haungaende kudenga.
Anonzwa kuchema kwako, Mufambi chidzoka; Woona misodzi yako, Kana uri woga.
Chodzoka iwe mufambi, Ishe wodaidza;
Uya kuM’chinjikwa wake, Wokuregerera.
William Bengo Collyer (1782-1854) (Verses)

hymn.title: IMI VANUNURWI
lyrics: Ye Ransomed Souls
St John, 228; Millenium, 227
Imi vanunurwi, Uyai kunaShe, Wouya kwatiri, Sokureva kwake; Farai netariro, farai,
Tichanunurwa kuzvivi.
Tinovimba naShe; Tikareurura, Wovimbisa iye Kutiregerera Nokutishambidza kuti Kuzvivi tigonunurwa.
Dama raShe idi, Haringapinduke; Norudowo rwedi; Totsveniswa naye.
Farai, muzivewo nemiwo, Kuti Kristu mununuri.
Ngatiuya narwo Rurumbidzo rwedu, Titende nenziyo Nomutsa kunesu; Farai netariro, farai, Takanunurwa kuzvivi.
William Henry (1783-1870)

hymn.title: INHANHO KUNA JESU
lyrics: Only A Step To Jesus,
Only A Step To Jesus, 764
Inhanho kuna Jesu! Chiita zvino;
Uya kuMponisi Nezvitadzo zvako.
Nhanho chete, nhanho chete, Wokumirira;
Chiuya uchibvuma Unozokomborerwa, Rega kuramba tsitsi, Iye wotambidza
Inhanho kuna Jesu! Tenda, uchapona; Anomira norudo Kukuregerera.
Inhanho kuna Jesu! Kuti uponiswe; Nguva yavakupera Wasarudza here?
Inhanho kuna Jesu! Huya, uchidaro: Kwamuri Muponisi, Ndozvipira zvino.
Fanny Crosby (1820-1915)
Sinners, Jesus Will Receive
Christ receiveth sinful men, 277
Jesu anogam’chira Paridzai matama. Kunavo vanosiya Nzira yokuruma.
Imbai zvakarezve, Vatadzi vogam’chirwa Rondedzera nemazvo, Vatadzi vogam’chirwa.
Uyai muzorore, Vimbai neizwi rake; Anotora vatadzi, Vatadzi vogam’chirwa.
Vatadzi vogam’chirwa, Kana zvitadzo zvangu Zvandashambidzwa mavara, Denga ndopinda naye.
Erdman Neumeister (1671-1756) trs. Emma Frances Bevan (1827-1909)(Verses changed)
Jesus Is Tenderly Calling
Jesus is calling, 700
Jesu anokudana kumusha, Woshevedza, woshevedza! Wosiyirei zuva rorudo, Womira kure kure?
Woshevedza, woshevedza! Jesu wodana, zvunyoro nhasi!
Jesu wodana kuvakaneta, Woshevedza, woshevedza! Uya nom’toro ukomborerwe; Haangakudzore,sva.
Jesu womirira, uya zvino, Womirira, womirira!
Uya nezvivi upfugamire; Uya, usanonoke!
Jesu wonyengetedza, terera! Mumwe nhasi, munzwe nhasi! Vanotenda vachafara kwazvo; Simuka, uya zvino!
Fanny Crosby (1820-1916)
O Wonderer, Knowing Not
Mercy still for thee, 155
Mufambi usingazive Tsitsi dzoM’ponisi, Zvino murima ugere, Nokuramba ngoni; Asi, iwe wodaidzwa NaShe, Mununuri, Anozokudzikinura, Ungawane tsitsi.
Ungawane tsitsi, Ungawane tsitsi, Mutadzi, wokutambura, Ungawane tsitsi.
Iwe, usina tariro, Wakafirwa naShe; Iye wafa segwayana Kuti uponiswe Udzikinurwe naIshe Pachena, mutadzi;
Rudo rwake chishamiso, Ungawane tsitsi.
Kunyange zvitadzo zvako Zvokura segomo,
Neropa ungashambidzwe, Upiwe kufara
Simutsira mwoyo wako, Teura kwaari;
Ngirozi dzoimba rwiyo: Ungawane tsitsi.
Herbert Howard Booth (1862-1926)
Sinner, See Yon Light,
Sinner, See Yon Light, 788
Mutadzi, ona kuvhenekerwa Kunobva paKarivhari,
Ropa rake rakayerera; Paakafa M’ponisi.
Chiuya , Chiuya KuM’chinjikwa wake; Maoko ake anotambidza, Ruregerero rwake.
Ndiye M’ponisi pasi pomuti, Wakatiteurira,
Pamhanza ropa rakabuda MuGestimani, rima.
Tarisa maoko oM’ponisi Anodaidza zvino; Ndakazvipira kukuponisa, Ndipewo mwoyo wako.
Uya kwaari, ubvume zvivi, Kune wakakufira;
Uya kwaari nomwoyo wedi Anokusunungura.
James Conner Bateman (1855-88)
Sinner, We Are Sent
Whither pilgrims, 453
Mutadzi, tokushevedza Nhasi kuchidyo chaShe; Woramba here kuuya, Uchanonokerei?
Siya zvose zvakaipa Rega kumirira hwedza; M’ponisi anoshevedza, Uya, zvino kwaari.
Uya, zvose zvagadzirwa; KuM;ponisi tizira;
Siya zvenyika mushure, Tsvaka kuregererwa.
Zviyevedzo zvepanyika, Zvingatitirei?
Zvingave nebasa rei Kunaye murasiki?
W. B. Bradbury (1816-68)

hymn.title: NDITARISE NDAMIRIRA
lyrics: Behold Me Standing At The Door
Behold me standing , 10; Calvary, 141
Nditarise, ndamira Ndinzwe ndichiteterera; Mumwoyo mako, mutadzi, Ngandipinde, ngandipinde.
Pamusuwo ndinomira Ndinzwe ndichiterera; Mumwoyo mako, mutadzi, Ngandipinde, ngandipinde.
Ndakakupfekera minzwa, Ndakatira ndichimira: Mumwoyo mako, mutadzi; Ngandipinde, ngandipinde.
Handikukumbire nhando; Yeuka zvangu zvirwadzo; Ndafa kuti ununurwe: Ngandipinde, ngandipinde.
Ndinouya norufaro, Norunyararo, norudo; Mumwoyo mako, mutadzi: Ngandipinde, ngandipinde.
Fanny Crosby (1820-1915)

hymn.title: NDIANI ACHATEVERA JESU?
lyrics: Who’ll Be The Next
Who’ll be the next, 859
Ndiani achatevera Jesu? Atakura M’chinjikwa wake?
Mumwe anoda, mumwe woenda, Ndiani wopfeka ngundu?
Ndianiko, ndianiko, Achatevera Muponisi? Ndiani womutevera zvino, Jesu M’ponisi?
Ndiani achatevera Jesu? Chiuya umupfugamire, Ndiani achatura mitoro Pachipfugamo chengoni?
Ndiani achatevera Jesu? Achirumbidza zita rake? Ndiani woimba ruponiso, Achirumbidza Gwayana?
Ndiani achatevera jesu, Kunyange munzira yokufa? Asangane navadzikinurwi, Voimba vari mhiri’yo?
Annie Sherwood Hawls (1835-1918)

hymn.title: NDIIMBIREZVE MASHOKO
lyrics: Sing Them Over Again
Wonderful words of life, 867
Ndiimbirezve, mashoko, Mazwi oupenyu; Ndione kunaka kwawo, Mazwi akanaka; Adzidzise basa.
Akanaka, akanaka, Mazwi oupenyu (pamhidza)
Kristu wopa kuna vose, Mazwi oupenyu; Mutadzi unganzwe Ishe, Pachena, wopiwa, Anotidaidza.
M’ponisi anodaidza, Mazwi oupenyu; Anopa kuregerera, Mazwi oupenyu. Jesu muponisi, Ndiye Muchengeti.
Philip Paul Bliss (1838-76)

hymn.title: NORUPFAVO, JESU ANOSHEVEDZA
lyrics: Softly And Tenderly
Come home! 631
Norupfavo, Jesu anoshevedza, Kwauri iwe neni!
Jesu womirira achitarisa, Tarisa iwe neni!
Uyai kumusha!
Imi mose makaneta! Nokutsenerera Jesu woshevedza, Woti: Mutadzi, uya!
Tomirirei Jesu achitidana, Kudana iwe neni?
Tononokerei kutsitsi dzake, Tsitsi kwauri neni?
Rwoshamisa rudo rwakavimbiswa, Vimbiswa iwe neni!
Nyange takatadza toregererwa, Kwauri iwe neni?
Will Lamartine Thompson(1847-1909)
Though Your Sins Be As Scarlet
Though your sins be as scarlet, 836
Nyangwe zvivi zvotsvuka, Zvichachena sechando Nyangwe zvove seropa, Zvichave semakushe.
Inzwa izwi rodana, Dzoka kuna Mwari; Ane nyasha zvikuru, Norudo runokosha.
Woregerera Zvivi, Nokusazviyeuka; Tarisai kwandiri, Wodaro Mwari wenyu.
Fanny Crosby (1820-1915)

hymn.title: TERERA IWE MUFAMBI
lyrics: Weary Wanderer, Wilt Thou Listen
Blaenwern.430
Terera, iwe mufambi, Norudo ndinoimba, Rwakaita Muponisi Kuti abve kudenga;
Muchidyiro chezvipfuwo ‘She wedu wakarinda; Panyika waive mweni, Kutsvaka vanotadza.
Pachikomo cheKarivhari, Vakamuroverera; Parutivi rwake ropa Rakazotishambidza; Kunyange akarambidza; Mambo kuti apinde, Nechokwadi ukapfidza Uchamuwana, Ishe.
Tine chitsigiro choMweya, Chinotisimbisa mudutu , Padombo risotsukunyudzwa Rakadzikwa murudo rwaIshe.
Chitsigiro chomira mukutya, here? Kana masaisai osundaidzwa, Kunyange dutu richivhuvhuta Hakuna chinganyudze ngarava.
Chichamira mudutu rorufu, here? Apo mweya wako wotonhodzwa Haungakundwe nyangwe mudutu, Kana une rutendo rune tariro.
Meso achaona mangwanani here? Guta regoridhe richipenya, Uchazorora here wave kudenga, Namadutu ose apera.
Priscilla Jane Owens (1829-1907)
Art Thou Weary?
Bullinger, 342; Stephanos, 343
Une nhamo, nokuneta Unotambudzwa?
Uya kwandiri, anoti, Zorora.
Ane mavangawo here? Kuti ndim’zive?
Tsoka, zvanza, divi, zvine Mavanga.
Ane ngundu youMambo Iri pamhanza here?
Hungu, ingundu asiwo, Yeminzwa.
Kana ndikamutevera Ndowaneiko?
Kusuwa, nebasa nayo Misodzi.
Ndikatsamira kwaari Ndichawanei?
Kusuwa kwose, nebasa Zvobiswa.
Ndikati, Ishe nditore, Woramba here?
Nyangwe zvose zvopfurura, Haarambe.
John Mason Neale (1818-66) from Stephen the Sabaite (1725-94)
Would You Be Free?
Wonder-working power, 753 AB
Ungasununguke pakuipa? Muropa raShe mune simba; Ungakunde zvose zvakaipa Ropa rake rine simba.
Mune simba rinoshamisa, Muropa reGwayana; (pamhidza)
Ungasununguke pane hasha? Muropa raShe munesimba;
Uya ushambidzwe paKar’vhari, Ropa rake rine simba.
Ungatsveniswe-tsveniswe kwazvo, Muropa raShe mune simba; Unganunurwe mumanyangadzo, Ropa rake rine simba.
Ungamuitire basaMambo? Muropa raShe munesimba; Ungagaromukudza nenziyo, Ropa rake rine simba.
Lewis Edgar Jones (1865-1936)
Come, Every Soul By Sin Oppressed
Only trust Him, 120; Evan, 85
Uya, iwe wakaneta, Ishe ane tsitsi; Achakupa kuzorora, Ukavimba nezwi.
Vimba naye, vimba naye, Uvimbe zvino;
Ishe achakuponisa Panguva ino.
Jesu wakaparadza ropa Kutikomborera;
Pinda ushambe muropa Rinochenesa ngwee.
Jesu idi, nayo nzira, Anokuzorodza; Vimba, usinganonoke, Ucharopafadzwa.
John Hart Stockton (1813-77)
Come To The Saviour
Make no delay, 730
Uyai kum’ponisi zvino, Shoko rake inzira yedu; Ari pakati pedu nhasi, Achiti: uyai
Tichafara pakusangana, Mwoyo yedu yakacheneswa, Kana toungana naIshe, Kumusha kudenga.
Uyai kuna ‘She, inzwa izwi! Mwoyo wose ngaufarise, Pachena ngatimusarudze, Musambononoka.
Fungai zvakare anesu, Achirayira, mutererei; Inzwai izwi rake, roti Uyai kwandiri.
George Frederick Root (1820-95)
Come, Ye That Love The Lord
From strength to strength, 184; Diademata, 182
Uyai, vanoda ‘She, Muve norufaro; Imbai zvinonakidza Pamberi paMambo Vangarambe havo Vasingamuzive Ishe, Asi isu varwi vake Titaure dama.
Tichanomuona ‘ko, Hatichazotadza;
Kubva kuhova dzengoni, Tonwa murufaro;
Tisati taenda ‘Ko kwaanogara,
Pfungwa idzi dzakanaka Dzinotifadzisa.
Vanhu vowana tsitsi Ivo vomurumbidza, Mapudzi ekudenga’ko Ndiwo orutendo; Naizvo tiimbe
Iwome misodzi, Tofamba munyika yaShe Kudenga kwaari.
Isaac Watts (1674-1748)
Come, Come Sinners To Jesus
The Lion of Judah, 573;
The Conquering Saviour, 572
Uyai vatadzi, kuna Jesu ‘She, Mutore ruponiso rwepachena; Mukai varanda, musakotsire, Tendai, chiedza, mbiri zvigopinda.
Mhondoro yaJudha ndiSamasimba Inokupa rukundo nguva dzose.
Satani nenyika zvichakurwisa, Kukudzivirira kuuya kwako, Sezvo Jesu M’ponisi akakunda, Achakuyamura kuti ukunde.
Nyangwe kurwa nenhamo zvichityisa, Kune dzimba dzerugare kudenga; Uchazoona ngundu noumbambo, Zvipo zvavakundi, zvakakumirira.
Kana wopinda mum’pata wokufa, Ufambe naye, wokupa masimba, Usingatye chinhu, uchiteura, Ngirozi dzichakupinza kudenga.
William Jefferson (1806-70)
Ten Thousand Souls,
The Judgement Day, 138
Zviuru zvizhinji, zhinji Zviri muUmambo; Zvavo vakapinda, asi Vamwe vane nzvimbo.
Uya, uya enda neni Kunzvimbo yokufara; Uchazopiwa upenyu Husingazoperi.
Kune nzvimbo yezvirema, Pamwe navatadzi;
Jesu wakaita izvi Ari paMchinjikwa.
Kune nzvimbo yomutadzi Asingambotendi;
‘She wakaponisa mubi, Achakuponisa.
Navo vanotsvaka nzira Kuti vanyaradzwe; Ngavazive kuti Kristu Angavanunure.
Neniwo, ndine chokwadi Kuti ndine nzvimbo; Naizvozvo ndichaimba Nezvoruponiso.
Daniel Herbert (1751-1833)
Response, Repentance And Confession
Not What These Hands Have Done
Dennis, 165; Lascelles, 170
Basa remaoko Harindinunure; Dambudziko romuviri Harindiponise.
Zvandinoda kuita Hazvipe rugare; Miteuro nemisodzi, Hazvindizorodze.
Basa renyu, Ishe, Ringandiponise;
Ropa reGwayana chete, Ringandinyaradze.
Rudo rwenyu, Baba; Kwete rwangu, Ishe, Rungarwise dambudziko, Rungandizorodze.
Ngoni dzenyu, Baba; Dzondiregerera; Simba renyu roga, Ishe Ringasunungure.
Ndinokudza Kristu, Ndozorora naye; Ndisina kukuhadzika:
M’ponisi wangu.
Horatius Bonar (1808-89)

hymn.title: ISHE, TANETSWA NEZVIVI
lyrics: Lord, We Are Oppressed With Sin
Randolph 292
Ishe, tanetswa nezvivi, Tinochemera kwamuri, Tichipfeka hanzu chena, Mutishambidze mumweya.
Nyika ino ichaguma, Uyai kuruponiso, Muchidedera kwaari,
Nomwoyo kuMuchinjikwa.
Ishe motipa hwedenga
Ushe hwoMweya Mutsvene; Vakaipa vapadzwe
Nesimba romweya wenyu.
Baba, tikomborerei, Tigare upenyu utsva; Tinatswe kusingapere, NaMwari norudo rwake.
Batsirai Gwaza
Rock Of Ages
Spanish Chant, 315; Norwood, 311; Coles, 305
Jesu, dombo rekare, Ngandizvivanze nemi, Mvura pamwe neropa Padafu zvakabuda Ngazvinyatsoshambidza. Ndicheniswe muzvivi.
Kuita basa Chete, Hakungakukwanire, Zvido zvangu zvizhinji, Misodzi yoyerera, Hazvingaripe mhosva, Mungaponise moga.
Mumaoko handina, Ndovimba noM’chinjikwa; Ndipfekedzei, M’ponisi Ndiyamure nengoni; Ndouya kutsimero, Ndishambidze ndisafe.
Kana mweya wapera, Kana meso adzima, Ndichauya kudenga Panzvimbo yokutongwa; Jesu dombo rekare, Ngandizvivanze nemi.
Augustus Montague Toplady

hymn.title: JESU KWAMURI NDOCHEMA
lyrics: Jesus My Lord, To Thee I Cry
Take me as I am, 479; Behold; the Savour, 75; Arnolds, 71
Jesu, kwamuri ndochema, Kunze kwenyu ndichazofa; Uyai nokuponisa, Ndigam’chirei zvino.
Ndigam’chirei zvino, Ndigam’chirei zvino, Jesu Kristu mandifira, Ndigam’chirei zvino,
Kubva munyadzi nokushaya, Ndouya,’She! Ndouya, ‘She! Ndowana mbiri yoM’chinjikwa, Jesu, ndinouya:
Kubva munhamo ndoripiwa, Kubva mudutu ndonyaradzwa, Nomukusuwa ndofariswa, Jesu, ndinouya.
Kubva mubishi rokuzvida, Ndouya,’She! Ndouya, ‘She! Ngandigare muchido chenyu, Jesu, ndinouya;
Ndozviisa murudo rwenyu, Pasina tariro, ndofara, Ndobhururukawo senjiva, Jesu, ndinouya.
Kubva kutya, kuzeza guva, Ndouya, ‘She! Ndouya, ‘She! Mukufara nomwenje wenyu, Jesu, ndinouya.
Kubva muzvivi zvakakomba, Ndopinda muzvivi zvakakomba, Ndopinda muzambara renyu, Ndogaroona uso hwenyu,
Jesu, ndinouya.
William True Sleeper (1819-1904)
What A Wonderful Change
Since Jesus came into my heart, 786
Muupenyu Hwangu ndasandurwa kwazvo naJesu mumwoyo wangu;
ndine ruvheneko rwandatsvaka kwazvo, NaJesu mumwoyo wangu.
Ndi Jesu mumwoyo wangu, Ndi Jesu mumwoyo wangu,
Wauya kwandiri nerufaro rwedi, Ndi Jesu mumwoyo wangu.
Ndaregera kudzungayira panyika, NaJesu mumwoyo mangu;
Zvino zvitadzo zvangu zvaregerwa, NaJesu mumwoyo wangu.
Ndine tarirowo isingadenheke, NaJesu mumwo wangu.
Nokukahadzika hakundidzivire, NaJesu mumwoyo wangu.
Kumusha kudenga ndichazoenda, NaJesu mumwoyo wangu; Nomurwendo rwangu ndichazofarisa, NaJesu mumwoyo wangu.
Rufus Henry Mc Daniel (1850-1940)

hymn.title: MWOYO WANGU WASARUDZA
lyrics: My Haert Is Fixed
Christ for me, 332; God is love,333; Zealley, 338
Mwoyo wangu wasarudza Muponisi;
Ini handichapinduka, Narinhi!
MuProfita naShe wangu, Ndiye Muponisi wangu, Ndoimba neizwi rangu; Muponisi.
Ngavave nepfuma vamwe, Muponisi;
Pfuma yaShe haipere, Mbiri yenyu ichapera, Mbiri yenyu ichaguma, Pfuma yaShe inogara, Muponisi.
Mukurwa, mukupona, Muponisi;
Muurombo, mukupfuma, Muponisi;
Napamusi wokuguma, Pandichazomudavira, Pandichazosiya nyika, Muponisi.
Nakwose kwandinoenda, Muponisi; Ndinozomuparidzira, Muponisi;
‘She, mavambo, namagumo, Rutariro, norufaro
Kwandiri Kristu ndizvozvo, Muponisi.
Richard Jukes (1804-67)
I Have Heard Of A Saviour’s Love
Yes, O yes, 509
Ndanzwa rudo rwoM’ponisi Rudo runoshamisa kwazvo; Wakauya kubva kudenga, Netsitsi, nomutsa kwandiri?
Ndizvozvo! Netsitsi nomutsa kwandiri Ndizvozvo! Netsitsi nomutsa kwandiri.
Ndanzwa kurwadziwa kwake; Kutambura kwake pamuti; Zvinomborehwa here kuti Akatambudzikira ini?
Ndataurirwa nezvedenga, Roonwa navarwi vaJesu, Kune nzvimbo here kudenga, Yakagadzirirwa iniwo?
‘She, pindura mibvunzo yangu, Ndoendepi asi kwaMuri?
Mungotiwo noMweya wenyu:
Ndine Muponisi kudenga.
Anne Shepherd (1809-57) (Mavhesi akachinjwa)
O Touch Mine Eyes
Rimington, 42; Duke Street, 17
Ndibatei meso ndione Uso hwenyu nokufara, Nomukudekara kwenyu,
Ndimhanye nokutsungirira.
Rurimi rwangu ruudze Zvitsvene kuvarasiki; Kuti, imi makauya Kuvatenga zvinokosha.
Zarurai nzeve ndigonzwa Kazevezeve kerudo Kandibise kunyika, Ndikuonei pakudenga.
Ndisunungurei ndimhanye Nenzira’yo youtsvene; Kana ndichibatwa nemi, Ndoona kupenya kwenyu.
W. Spencer Walton (1850-1906)
What Can Wash Away My Sin?
Nothing but the blood of Jesus, 328
Ndingashambidzwe nei? Neropa raJesu chete.
Ndingatsveniswa nei? Neropa raJesu chete.
Itsime reropa Rinondishambidza, Handizive rimwe Iropa raJesu chete.
Hakuna kucheniswa Kunze kweropa raJesu. Nako kuregererwa Kunze kweropa raJesu.
Hakuna rununuro, Kunze kweropa raJesu. Kana basa ranguwo, Kunze kweropa raJesu.
Hakuna rutariro, Kunze kweropa raJesu; Hakunawo nduramo, Kunze kweropa raJesu.
Robert Lowry ( 1826-99)
Why Should I Wait
Just as Thou Art, 474
Ndomirirei, handitizire Kumwezve asi kunemi; Kunyange ndiri mutadzi, Ndouya, Ishe, ndouya.
Ndomirirei, ndozvitarisa, Ndinoona zvivi chete; Ndimi mungandishambidze; Ndouya, Ishe, ndouya.
Ndashamba muropa ra’She wandichenesa sechando.
Chivimbiso kuna ani, Chosanganisira neni; Ndakauya, ndinoziva Ropa rakandichenesa.
Handikahadzike kuti Mavara akashambidzwa; Mumwoyo mangu ndoziva Ropa rinondichenesa.
Ndiani wouya zvino Ashambidzwe zvivi zvake, Mukutendeka woziva Hanzu dzochena sechando?
Edwin Othello Excell (1851-1921)
My Jesus I Love Thee
Unsworth, 577; Flow gently, Sweet Afton, 558
Jesu ndinokudai, muri ‘ye wangu, Ndinosiya zvose nokuda kwenyu; Muri Mununuri, Mponisi wangu, Ndinokudai Jesu, ndokuda zvino.
Ndinokudai nokuti makandida, Matenga rudzikinuro paK’vhari; Ndinokudai makapfekedzwa minzwa. Ndinokudai Jesu, ndokudai zvino.
Ndinokudai muupenyu, nomurufu; Ndokurumbidzai nokusingaperi; Nomusi wokufa ndichazoimba; Ndinokudai Jesu, ndokudai zvino.
Mazambara orufaro ikoko, Ndichazonamata pasuo hwenyu; Ndichazoimba nengundu pamhanza; Ndinokudai Jesu, ndokudai zvino.
William Ralph Featherstone

hymn.title: JESU ‘SHE ANONDIDA NARINHI
lyrics: Now I Belong To Jesus
Now i belong to Jesus, 751
Jesu, ‘She anondida narinhi, Handibiswe kwaari nezvivi, Ndiye mudzikinuri wangu, Zvino ndave wake
Zvino ndave waJesu, Jesu wave wangu; Kusiri kwenguva shoma, Asi narinhiwo.
Ndakarasika muzvakaipa; Jesu wauya kundiponisa,
Ndabiswa kubva mukuyedzwa, Zvino ndave wake.
Ndofara, Jesu wandiponisa, Kubva muzvivi zvakandibata; Ropa rake randinunura, Zvino ndave wake.
Norman John Clayton
Jesus Came To Save Me
This one thing I Know, 834
Jesu wanditenga Neropa rake,
Zvino ndakaponiswa, Ndave waMwari; Ndacheniswa sechando: Izvi ndoziva!
Izvi ndoziva! Izvi ndoziva! Mwari wandiregerera, Wakandisunungura, ‘She, Ndaimbove bofu, ini, Zvino ndoona!
Jesu muchengeti: O, zvoshamisa! Pamberi paBaba, Wondimirira; Anodzinga madutu: Izvi ndoziva.
‘She, mutsvene sei! Ndogaroimba; Wakambozvidziwa, Asi ndiMambo.
Nzira yangu yopenya; Izvi ndoziva.
Sydney Edward Cox (1887-1975)

hymn.title: KUGARA MURUDO
lyrics: Living In The Fountain
This one thing I Know, 834
Kugara murudo, Nomuchiyedza, Kutenda narinhi She samasimba; Kugaromuziva Kufara kwake; Ngakuvewo neni Panguva dzose.
Ndopupurira Jesu, Ndiri ‘ye waShe; Anondifadzisa.
Ndomupa zvose
Kuve wake, Jesu, Upenyu hwangu; Rufaro narinhi, Haruparadzwe; Kugara, kutenda, Ndisina kutya, Ndogam’chira pano Chipo chedenga.
Ndinorwira mbiri, YoMuchinjikwa; Pane mubayiro, Kana pasina, Achazondidana Chisiya zvombo, Kurwa kwazopera, Uya ugadzwe.
Bramwell Booth (1856-1929)
Years I Spent In Vanity And Pride
At Calvary, 611
Makore andakaparadza, Ndisina hanya naShe wangu; Ndisingazive wandifira, PaKarivhari.
Tsitsi zhinji nengoni dzake, Dzaakandipawo pachena; Mweya wangu wasunungurwa PaKarivhari
Neshoko raMwari ndoziva Murau wenyu wandatyora; Mweya wangu wonyengetera PaKarivhari.
Ndopira zvose kuna Jesu, Ndamugam’chira saShe wangu, Mweya wopemberera, woimba, PaKarivhari.
Norudo rwake taponiswa! Nengoni dzatiburukira! Wakave zambuko reduwo, PaKarivhari.
William Reed Newell (1868-1956)

hymn.title: M’PONISI WAKANDITSVAGA
lyrics: The Saviour Sought And Found Me
O What a wonderful day, 761
M’ponisi wakanditsvaga Kuresa nenzira Wakandiita ndione, Pazuvaro rinoshamisa.
Jesu wanditsvaka, Ndakanga ndichidzungaira; Jesu wandiwana
Zuva rinoshamisa.
Wakatura mutoro, Wedambudzo rangu, Nomutsa ndaregererwa, Pazuvaro rinoshamisa.
Ndaivewo mutadzi, Akandishambidza;
Mwoyo wazadzwa norwiyo Pazuvaro rinoshamisa.
Sidney Edward Cox (1887-1975) Universal Songs, Holand
My Soul Is With The Saviour
O What a wonderful day, 761; I will
Mweya wangu uno Muponisi, Wakasunungurwa;
Ndofanira kusarudza zvino, Ndichagamuchira ‘She
Ndoda, ndoda ndoda Mwari muyamuri wangu; Ndakatengwa neropa raShe Ndava wenyu chose.
Nengoni ndichagam’chira tsitsi; Rudo rwenyu Kristu;
Rwaukunda mwoyo wangu kwazvo, Ndichavimba nemi.
Munoziva kusasimba kwangu, Ndotya kurasika;
Asi imi muri simba rangu, Munondipa simba.
Hungu, Ishe, tipei isu tose, Ngoni dzenyu nhasi; Sezvinobva mumwoyo tichiti: Tichava waKristu.
Rudo chete, rudo chete, Rwakandinyurura, Rudo chete.
Mwoyo wangu ndomupa, Naye ndonomatira; Ndoponiswa maari, Ndichimuimbira;
Rudo rwake ndorwedi, Ndokudza nenziyo; Kuvimbika mubasa Ndozvake, ‘She.
Mwoyo iri munjodzi Ngaitarire ‘She; Jesu anoponesa Wokuzvuva norudo;
Ndiye Tenzi wegungwa, Rinomuteerera;
Ishe anoda kuti Uponiswe.
James Rowe (1865-1933)
I Heard The Voice Of Jesus Say
Behold the Saviour, 75; Vox Delecti, 160
Ndakanzwa Jesu achiti: Uya uzorore;
Zorora waneta, rinza Musoro pandiri.
Ndakauya kuna Jesu, Ndakaneta kwazvo; Ndakawana kuzorora, Ndinarwo rufaro.
Ndakanzwa Jesu achiti: Tarisa ndokupa
Mvura youpenyu zvino, Inwa, uchapona.
Ndakauya kuna Jesu, Ndakanwa mvura ‘yo; Nyota yangu yakapera, Zvino ndaponiswa.
Ndakanzwa Jesu achiti: Nditarise, iwe;
Ndiri chiedza chenyika, Ndikuvhenekere.
Ndakatarisa kwaari, Iye zuva rangu; Muchiedza choupenyu, Ndofamba narinhi.
Horatius Boar (1808-89)
I Heard Of A Saviour, Whose Love Was So Great
*Those endearing young charms, 541; The old rustic bridge, 540
Ndakanzwa zvorudo rukuru rwaShe, Pamuti wakafira ini; Vakamupfekedza ngundu yeminzwa, Kuregerera m’tadzi seni
*Wakaregerera mutadzi seni, Wakaregerera mutadzai seni, Vamupfekedza ngundu yeminzwa, Kuregerera mutadzi.
Vatadzi wakavachemera, woti: Dai maiziva Muponisi, Ndaikuchengetai pasi pemapapiro, Kuregerera vatadzi semi
Urwo rudo rwake rwandishamisa Rwandiunza kuna Jesu: Zvandakauya haangandirase, Waregerera mutadzi seni.
Idi, unoponisa m’tadzi wose, Iwe haangakudzinge, Akakumbira netsitsi dzake Saka, uya uponiswe.
Now I Have Found A Friend
Robin Adair, OTB 374
Ndawana shamwari Jesu wangu;
Rudo runogara, Jesu wangu; Rufaro nehama, Zvichazopfuura, Ini Ndagarika, Jesu wangu.
Kana ndapererwa, Jesu wangu; Anondisimbisa, Jesu wangu; Anondichengeta, Anondinunura, anonditsigira, Jesu wangu.
Nyika yapfuura, Jesu wangu; Patichazotongwa, Jesu wangu; Ndichazomuona, Mambo wokudenga, Nokumurumbidza, Jesu wangu.
Eliza Read
Ndasiya zvenyika, Jesu wangu; Ndinoda zvedenga, Jesu wangu;
Ndiye Mununuri, Ndiye Muchengeti, Ndiye Muponisi, Jesu wangu.
In Evil Long Took Delight
Oh, the lamb (OTB 56)
Ndichimboita kuipa, Ndisina nokutya; Dakara ndaona uso Hwakandikarira.
Gwayana raroverwa, Gwayana reKarivhari, Riripo rakabayiwa Ndiye Mununuri.
NdiJesu waroverwa, Iye wakarwadzwa; Kwandiri wakatarisa, Ari paM’chinjikwa.
Handichazokukanganwa Kutarisa kwake;
Uko kwandipa mhosva Asingataure
Hana yakabvuma mhosva, Yakanditsamwisa; Ndakaona zvivi zvangu Zvamuroverera.
Akatarisa achiti: Ndokuregerera,
Kufa kwangu, ropa rangu, Zvinodzikinura.
Rufu rwake rworatidza Zvivi zvangu zvose, Chishamiso tsitsi dzake, Dzondiregerera.
W. A. Havergal
I Am So Glad
I am so glad , 527
Ndinofara Baba wokudenga Woreva rudo mugwaro rake; Ndoona mubhuku zvishamiso Zvinoti: Jesu anondidawo.
Ndinofara Jesu wandida, Anondida, anondida, Ndinofara Jesu wandida, Ini anondida.
Jesu anondida, ndinomuda, Rudo rwake rwakandinunura; Nm’towo werudo wandifira; Ndine chokwadi Jesu wondida.
Kana ndikabvunzwa ndingatii? Mbiri kuna Jesu ndinoziva; Mweya Mutsvene tobvumirana, Topupura Jesu anondidisa.
Kana pane rumbo rwandingaimbe, Murunako Mambo ndomuona, Rumbo urwu ndoimba narini Chishamiso, Jesu anondida.
Muchokwadi ndinozorora; Ndovimba naye ndokomborerwa; Satani wogumbuka, wotiza, Ndamuudza, Jesu anondida.
Philip Paul Bliss ( 1838-76)
I Believe That God , The Father
Bethany, 429
Ndinotenda kuti Mwari Ari muMwana wake, Muunyoro hwake, Jesu, Rudo rworatidzwa, Nyangwe vakamurovera Nokumuramba, Ishe, M’chinjikwa ndirwo rudo RwaMwari paKarivhari.
Ndinotenda kuti Mwari Angasandure mwoyo, Nokunatsa unhu hwedu, Nokubwinyaswa nengoni, Voutera vangarambwe; Asi vangasimbiswe, Kumhuri yaIshe Jesu Vose vana vaMwari.
Munyika Ukasanduka Zvimwe zvinogarawo Tingagare muutsvene, Nengoni dzake Mwari,
Vose vonzwa Mweya M’tsvene Voterera ‘ zwi rake.
VaKritsu vangave sa’ye Nomurusununguko.
Zvivimbiso zvake Jesu Hazvichazosanduka, Ndakambozviedza kare, Ndinozvitenda nhasi. Mwari anopa muranda Zvombo zvebasa rake; Simba ndere vanotsvaka, Ngoni, vanokumbira.
John Gowans
Blessed Assurance
Blessed assurance, 621
Ndinovimba naShe M’ponisi, Anondipa rufaro rwedi; Nom’towo wake ndanunurwa, Ndazvarwa patsva, ndatsveniswa
Inyaya yangu, rumbo rwangu, Ndichimukudza Jesu wangu.
Ndozvipfavisa norufaro, Ndinoonazve zvinakidzo; Ngirozi dzashe dzinouya, Norudo rwake nawo mutsa.
Muna Jesu ndinozorora, NoM’ponisi ndaropafadzwa; Ndiri murudo norunako, Ndomirira ‘She netariro.
Fanny Crosby (1820-1915)
One There Is Above All Others
All through the night, 339
Pane mumwechete bedzi Anotida!
Rwake rudo rwakakomba, Anotida!
‘Shamwari dzingatisiye, Dzingagarotinyengedza, Asi iye ndiye chete, Anotida!
Kumuziva, ndoupenyu, Anotida!
Ngatifunge timutende Anotida!
Wakatitenga neropa, Nomungwenga watitsvaga, Wakatidzora kudanga, Anotida!
Tawana shamwari Jesu, Anotida!
Anozotiropafadza, Anotida!
Mwoyo yofara kumunzwa, Achiti tigere pedyo,
Totyei kuvimba naye? Anotida!
Ungazive Jesu here? Anotida!
Zvipire kwaari zvino Anotida!
Wokupa makomborero, Akanakisisa chete, Woenda newe kudenga, Anotida!
Mary Ann Nunn (1778-1847)
When Upon Life’s Billows
Count your blessing, 202
Nhamo dzepasi dzikakutambudza, Nokutsamwa kukada kukurasa; Ona makomborero averenge , Uchashamiswa zviito zvShe.
Averenge makomborero, Averenge mazita awo Averenge maropafadzo, Uchamiswa nezviito zvaShe.
Une mutoro wezvishusho here? M’chinjikwa unoremera here? Verenga, zvinatso nhamo dzorova, Uchaimba mazuva achipfuura.
Mumatambudziko makuru, madiki, Usatsamwe ari pam’soro Mwari; Verenga zvinatso uchanyaradzwa, Nomurwendo rwose uchayamurwa.
Johnson Oatman (1856-1922)
Down At The Cross Where My Saviour Died
Glory to His name, 654
PaMuchinjikwa woM’ponisi Ndakachemera kumushambidzwa; Mwoyo washambidzwa muropa, Ngaarumbidzwe!
Ngaarumbidzwe Ishe Ngaarumbidzwe Ishe,
Mwoyo washambidzwe muropa, Ngaarumbidzwe!
Ndaponiswa kubva muzvivi, Jesu achagara mandiri; NomUchinjikwa ndichakunda, Ngaarumbidzwe!
Tsime rinoshambidza zvivi, Ndofara kupinda mariri; Umo ndoshambidzwa naJesu Ngaarumbidzwe!
Uya kutsime roupenyu, Wira patsoka dzoM’ponisi,
Pindamo nhasi ushambidzwe, Ngaarumbidzwe!
Ndakanga ndakati rukutu, Ndinokuipa mumwoyo; Ndouya kwamuri kutsvaka Simba nenduramo.
Ishe ndinouya, ndouya! Ishe ndinouya, ndouya! Ndishambidzei muropa Ndive m’chena ngwee!
Elisha A. Hoffman (1839-1929) Major Matthew Shava Kunzvi (1899-1968)
verse 5 and chorus
O, What A Wonderful, Wonderful Day
Heaven came down, 666
Raive zuva rinoshamisa, Randisingakanganwe; Pandaidzungayira murima, Ndakasangana naShe;
O, shamwari yomutsa netsitsi, Mwoyo wangu wogutswa; Nhamo dzapera, norufaro ndoti; Rima rose, rakadzingwa.
Denga rakadzika mumweya wangu
Ari paM’chinjikwa ndaponiswa, Zvivi zvashambidzwa,
Rima rave chiedza
Mweya wangu wave nezvedenga.
Ndakazvarwa patsva noMweya Mumhuri yake Mwari, Ndanatswa norudo rweKar’vhari, Ndave panzvimbo tsvene;
Nyaya yakapera pakarepo Ndasvika somutadzi, Ndikatora ngoni dzaakandipa, Ndaponiswa, ngaakudzwe!
Ndine tariro isingaperi Nokufamba kwenguva;
Ndine nzvimbo kudenga, chokwadi, Mudzimba dzinopenya,
Nenzira yezuva riye riye, Ndatenda paM’chinjikwa, Hupfumi namakomborero ake, Zvobva muruoko rwake.
John W. Peterson
O Happy Day
O happy day, 37; Morning Hymn, 35
Rakanaka iro zuva Randakatenda kuna ‘She; Mwoyo wangu unofara, Ndinoudza vanhu vose.
Zuva rakanaka, RaJesu wandiponisa! Iye wakandidzidzisa Kurinda nokuteura; Zuva rakanaka, RaJesu wandiponisa.
Chitendero chitsvene, Chinondisunga kuna She, Ngaizadzwe imba yake, Nenziyo dzingamukudze.
Basa guru rakapera Ari wangu ndiri wake,
Wandidana ndikabvuma, Ndayevedzwa nezwi rake.
Mwoyo wangu uzorore, Neichi chitenderano; Urege kusiya Ishe,
Iye anadzo nduramo.
Nokudenga chakanzwika Ichi chivimbiso changu; Chichanzwika misi yose Dakara rusvike rufu.
Philip Doddridge (1702-51)
When We Walk With The Lord
Trust and Obey, 586
Tichifamba isu, Neizwi raJesu, Anovhenekera panzira; Tichiita kuda, KwaJesu, wotida Anogara nesu nesimba.
Kuterera, kuvimba naJesu, Ndiyo nzira kuwana, Rufaro m’penyu.
Mimvuri yeshusho Makore enhamo, Zvichabiswa nouso hwake, Hapana kuchema, Hapanawo kutya,
Kana tichivimba naIshe.
Hapana mutoro Kana dambudziko;
Zvisina mubairo wazvo; Hapana kusuwa
Hapana M’chinjikwa, Zvose zvina makomborero.
Hatizive rudo Rufaro rwamambo
Tisingazvipire kunaShe, Nyasha waratidza, Rufaro watipa,
Ndozvavo vanovimba naye.
Nomukuwadzana, Naye tichigara,
Tichifamba naye munzira; Tichamuterera, Tichamutevera, Hatichazotya tichivimba.
O How Happy Are They
Well’ll all shout, Hallelujah! 587
Vanofara kwazvo vanoterera ‘She, Vane pfuma kudenga uko;
Mutsa, runyararo hazvingataurwe Mwoyo wazodzwa norudo rwaJesu.
Tichaimba Hareruya Tichifamba kudenga Tichaimba nerudo Rwotipa ruponiso Tichafara naJesu ‘Kokudenga. 178
Ndiri kunyaradzwa nenyasha dzedenga, Nom’towo weropa raJesu;
Mumwoyo ndinotenda, rufaro ndinowana,
Nezita raJesu ndoona Denga.
Zvino ndinofara savari kudenga, Ngirozi hadzina zvizhinji
Asi kupfugama nokumunamata, Iye anovada vatadzi.
Ndinonzwa rufaro rukuru mumwoyo, Pamusana pokuponiswa;
NaJesu mandiri ndinokomborerwa, Ndichazadzwa nezvewedenga.
Charles Wesley (1707-88) (mavhesi akasandurwa)
(e)	KUWANIRA MWARI NYIKA YOSE
The World of God
Whosoever Heareth
Whosoever heareth, 551
Ndianiko anonzwa dama raShe, Afambise nhau kunyika dzose, Aparidze kuvanhu kose kose, Anoda ngaauye.
Uyai zvino, uyai zvino, Inzwai matama oruponiso, Baba wokudenga anoda vose Anoda ngaauye.
Wose anouya asanonoke, Musuwo wazarurwa angapinde; Jesu ndiye nzira nechokwadizve Anoda ngaauye.
Anoda chokwadi anovimbiswa, Chivimbiso chokuti haachafa, Achapiwa hupenyu hunogara, Anoda ngaauye.
Philip Paul Bliss (1838-76)
The Church’s One Foundation
Aurelia, 246
Hwaro hwechichi humwe, Jesu ndiye Tenzi; Chisikwa chake chitsva Nemvura neizwi; Mwenga wake mutsvene Wepasi pedenga;
Neropa waitenga, Nokuifirazve.
Vasarudzwi vepasi Vose vamwechete; Chitendero chaIshe; Rutendo, kuzvarwa; Vokudza zita rimwe Nechidyo chitsvene; Tariro imwechete, Yozadzwa nengoni.
Nomumatambudziko, Nebishi rehondo; Vomirira magumo Okusingaperi; Dakara netariro Vazokomborerwa; Nechechi ichikunda; Nokuzozorodzwa.
Pasi pano vaziva Utatu hwaMwari; Vosanganiswa vose Navo vakakunda; Vatsvene vanofara, Ishe, tipei ngoni, Saivo, tizogara Navo pakudenga
To Save The World, The Saviour Came
Give to Jesus glory, 354
Kuponisa nyika yose, Netsitsi wakafira; Nyika iyi iparidzwe, Ipai mbiri Jesu.
Mbiri kuna Jesu, Mbiri kuna Jesu, Paridzai rununuro, Ipai mbiri Jesu.
Ngoni zhinji dzepachema! DzaShe wodana vose; Ave Muponisi wavo, Ngavape mbiri Jesu.
Kwose Kwose kune vanhu Ngatizivise nyaya,
Tiimbe zverudo rwake, Tigopa mbiri Jesu.
Kuregererwa ndokwavo Vanoreurura nedi, Mutadzi woregererwa, Chimupa mbiri Jesu.
Richard Slater (1854-1939)
(mavhesi)
W.H. Clark(Chorus)
All Round The World, The Army
Poor old, 769
Kwose kwose, hondo inofamba, Kwose kwose, vanhu voponiswa; Kwose kwose, mauto otsunga, Ngativheyese mureza kwose kwose.
Vheyesa, Vheyesa, Vheyesa mureza, Ngativheyese mureza Kwose kwose
Kwose kwose, tichaimba nziyo. Kwose kwose, tofamba nesimba Vatadzi vose vosunungurwa, Tovheyesa mureza waJesu kwose
Kwose kwose, ngoni dzoyerera, Kwose kwose, toenda kundorwa, Kwose kwose, nyika inunurwe, Neropa nomoto mauto okunda.
William James Pearson (183-92)
Whosoever Will May Come,
Whosoever will may come, 860
Ngavatore ruponiso Vanoda kugara naShe; Nokuti runovimbiswa Kupiwa kumunhu wose.
Munhu wose ngaauye; Anouya ngaazive
Kuti haachatsamwa, Jesu wati: munhu wose.
Izwi iri rinosvika, Kundudzi dzevanhu vose; Hapana nokusarudzwa; Jesu wati: munhu wose.
Kuna vanotya mumwoyo, Tariro haishaikwe; Ngavauye vasingatye, Jesu wati: munhu wose.
Kuvanhu vose venyika, Matama aya agere; Anoti munzeve dzavo; Angauye munhu wose.
William John McAlonanan
We Are Marching On
Happy song, 661
Tinofamba nenhowo, nomureza, Tiitire She basa rakanaka, Torumbidza zita rake nesimba, Tichimurwira Ishe.
Mukai, mukai, imbai, imbai Farai, farai tichifamba pamberi, Tinofamba pamberi tichiimba, Toenda Kunyika yakavimbiswa, Uyai nesu savarwi panyika, Tichamurwira Ishe.
Tagadzirira hondo yedu kunze, Tinofamba pamberi nomureza; Muchinjikwa waShe tinotakura, Tichashandira Jesu.
Tofamba mberi, ari pedyo nesu, Anotidzivirira nezwi rake, Hatimbotya vavengi, ngavauye, Tichashandira Ishe.
Tofamba kunowana mubairo, Kune ngundu inopenya kudenga, Kune rufaro rusingazombofa, Tichashandira Ishe.
Fanny Crosby (1820-1915)
Tell Out Wonderful Story,
You can tell out the swwet story, 869
Udza nyaya yakanaka, Kwose kwowoenda; Mambo nokubwinya kwake Nokutida kwake
Ndiyo nyaya inokosha, Takanunurwa naJesu, Ungaudze nyaya tsvene, Iwewe.
Ungaudze nyaya tsvene, Iwewew;
Ungaudze mumwe wako, Uchatura m’toro wake, Ungaudze nyaya tsvene, Iwewe.
Hapana imwe nyaya zve Ingataurwe panyika, Mukutadza wakatida, Ngoni dzake zhinji, Mukudzunga wotitsvaka, Wotidzora kuna Baba, Ungaudze nyaya tsvene, Iwewe.
Inyaya tsvene yaJsesu, Kuvatadzi vose; Inyaya tsvene yetsitsi, Jesu wovarapa; Kuvanunura vatadzi,
